00077 /*********************** Menu Data Parsing ********************* */
00078 
00079 typedef struct MenuEntry {
00080     const char *str;
00081     int retval;
00082     int icon;
00083     int sepr;
00084 } MenuEntry;
00085 
00086 typedef struct MenuData {
00087     const char *instr;
00088     const char *title;
00089     int titleicon;
00090     
00091     MenuEntry *items;
00092     int nitems, itemssize;
00093 } MenuData;
00094 
00095 static MenuData *menudata_new(const char *instr)
00096 {
00097     MenuData *md = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(*md), "MenuData");
00098 
00099     md->instr = instr;
00100     md->title = NULL;
00101     md->titleicon = 0;
00102     md->items = NULL;
00103     md->nitems = md->itemssize = 0;
00104     
00105     return md;
00106 }
00107 
00108 static void menudata_set_title(MenuData *md, const char *title, int titleicon)
00109 {
00110     if (!md->title)
00111         md->title = title;
00112     if (!md->titleicon)
00113         md->titleicon = titleicon;
00114 }
00115 
00116 static void menudata_add_item(MenuData *md, const char *str, int retval, int icon, int sepr)
00117 {
00118     if (md->nitems == md->itemssize) {
00119         int nsize = md->itemssize ? (md->itemssize << 1) : 1;
00120         MenuEntry *oitems = md->items;
00121         
00122         md->items = MEM_mallocN(nsize * sizeof(*md->items), "md->items");
00123         if (oitems) {
00124             memcpy(md->items, oitems, md->nitems * sizeof(*md->items));
00125             MEM_freeN(oitems);
00126         }
00127         
00128         md->itemssize = nsize;
00129     }
00130     
00131     md->items[md->nitems].str = str;
00132     md->items[md->nitems].retval = retval;
00133     md->items[md->nitems].icon = icon;
00134     md->items[md->nitems].sepr = sepr;
00135     md->nitems++;
00136 }
00137 
00138 static void menudata_free(MenuData *md)
00139 {
00140     MEM_freeN((void *)md->instr);
00141     if (md->items) {
00142         MEM_freeN(md->items);
00143     }
00144     MEM_freeN(md);
00145 }
00146 
00160 static MenuData *decompose_menu_string(const char *str)
00161 {
00162     char *instr = BLI_strdup(str);
00163     MenuData *md = menudata_new(instr);
00164     const char *nitem = NULL;
00165     char *s = instr;
00166     int nicon = 0, nretval = 1, nitem_is_title = 0, nitem_is_sepr = 0;
00167     
00168     while (1) {
00169         char c = *s;
00170 
00171         if (c == '%') {
00172             if (s[1] == 'x') {
00173                 nretval = atoi(s + 2);
00174 
00175                 *s = '\0';
00176                 s++;
00177             }
00178             else if (s[1] == 't') {
00179                 nitem_is_title = (s != instr); /* check for empty title */
00180 
00181                 *s = '\0';
00182                 s++;
00183             }
00184             else if (s[1] == 'l') {
00185                 nitem_is_sepr = 1;
00186                 if (!nitem) nitem = "";
00187 
00188                 *s = '\0';
00189                 s++;
00190             }
00191             else if (s[1] == 'i') {
00192                 nicon = atoi(s + 2);
00193                 
00194                 *s = '\0';
00195                 s++;
00196             }
00197         }
00198         else if (c == '|' || c == '\n' || c == '\0') {
00199             if (nitem) {
00200                 *s = '\0';
00201 
00202                 if (nitem_is_title) {
00203                     menudata_set_title(md, nitem, nicon);
00204                     nitem_is_title = 0;
00205                 }
00206                 else if (nitem_is_sepr) {
00207                     /* prevent separator to get a value */
00208                     menudata_add_item(md, nitem, -1, nicon, 1);
00209                     nretval = md->nitems + 1;
00210                     nitem_is_sepr = 0;
00211                 }
00212                 else {
00213                     menudata_add_item(md, nitem, nretval, nicon, 0);
00214                     nretval = md->nitems + 1;
00215                 } 
00216                 
00217                 nitem = NULL;
00218                 nicon = 0;
00219             }
00220             
00221             if (c == '\0') {
00222                 break;
00223             }
00224         }
00225         else if (!nitem) {
00226             nitem = s;
00227         }
00228 
00229         s++;
00230     }
00231     
00232     return md;
00233 }
00234 
00235 void ui_set_name_menu(uiBut *but, int value)
00236 {
00237     MenuData *md;
00238     int i;
00239     
00240     md = decompose_menu_string(but->str);
00241     for (i = 0; i < md->nitems; i++) {
00242         if (md->items[i].retval == value) {
00243             BLI_strncpy(but->drawstr, md->items[i].str, sizeof(but->drawstr));
00244             break;
00245         }
00246     }
00247     
00248     menudata_free(md);
00249 }
00250 
00251 int ui_step_name_menu(uiBut *but, int step)
00252 {
00253     MenuData *md;
00254     int value = ui_get_but_val(but);
00255     int i;
00256     
00257     md = decompose_menu_string(but->str);
00258     for (i = 0; i < md->nitems; i++)
00259         if (md->items[i].retval == value)
00260             break;
00261     
00262     if (step == 1) {
00263         /* skip separators */
00264         for (; i < md->nitems - 1; i++) {
00265             if (md->items[i + 1].retval != -1) {
00266                 value = md->items[i + 1].retval;
00267                 break;
00268             }
00269         }
00270     }
00271     else {
00272         if (i > 0) {
00273             /* skip separators */
00274             for (; i > 0; i--) {
00275                 if (md->items[i - 1].retval != -1) {
00276                     value = md->items[i - 1].retval;
00277                     break;
00278                 }
00279             }
00280         }
00281     }
00282     
00283     menudata_free(md);
00284         
00285     return value;
00286 }

00291 static ARegion *ui_add_temporary_region(bScreen *sc)
00292 {
00293     ARegion *ar;
00294 
00295     ar = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegion), "area region");
00296     BLI_addtail(&sc->regionbase, ar);
00297 
00298     ar->regiontype = RGN_TYPE_TEMPORARY;
00299     ar->alignment = RGN_ALIGN_FLOAT;
00300 
00301     return ar;
00302 }
00303 
00304 static void ui_remove_temporary_region(bContext *C, bScreen *sc, ARegion *ar)
00305 {
00306     if (CTX_wm_window(C))
00307         wm_draw_region_clear(CTX_wm_window(C), ar);
00308 
00309     ED_region_exit(C, ar);
00310     BKE_area_region_free(NULL, ar);     /* NULL: no spacetype */
00311     BLI_freelinkN(&sc->regionbase, ar);
00312 }

00314 /************************* Creating Tooltips **********************/
00315 
00316 typedef enum {
00317     UI_TIP_LC_MAIN,
00318     UI_TIP_LC_NORMAL,
00319     UI_TIP_LC_PYTHON,
00320     UI_TIP_LC_ALERT,
00321     UI_TIP_LC_SUBMENU
00322 } uiTooltipLineColor;
00323 #define UI_TIP_LC_MAX 5
00324 
00325 #define MAX_TOOLTIP_LINES 8
00326 typedef struct uiTooltipData {
00327     rcti bbox;
00328     uiFontStyle fstyle;
00329     char lines[MAX_TOOLTIP_LINES][512];
00330     uiTooltipLineColor color_id[MAX_TOOLTIP_LINES];
00331     int totline;
00332     int toth, spaceh, lineh;
00333 } uiTooltipData;
00334 
00335 static void rgb_tint(float col[3],
00336                      float h, float h_strength,
00337                      float v, float v_strength)
00338 {
00339     float col_hsv_from[3];
00340     float col_hsv_to[3];
00341 
00342     rgb_to_hsv(col[0], col[1], col[2],    col_hsv_from + 0, col_hsv_from + 1, col_hsv_from + 2);
00343 
00344     col_hsv_to[0] = h;
00345     col_hsv_to[1] = h_strength;
00346     col_hsv_to[2] = (col_hsv_from[2] * (1.0f - v_strength)) + (v * v_strength);
00347 
00348     hsv_to_rgb(col_hsv_to[0], col_hsv_to[1], col_hsv_to[2], col + 0, col + 1, col + 2);
00349 }
00350 
00351 static void ui_tooltip_region_draw_cb(const bContext *UNUSED(C), ARegion *ar)
00352 {
00353     uiTooltipData *data = ar->regiondata;
00354     uiWidgetColors *theme = ui_tooltip_get_theme();
00355     rcti bbox = data->bbox;
00356     float tip_colors[UI_TIP_LC_MAX][3];
00357 
00358     float *main_color    = tip_colors[UI_TIP_LC_MAIN]; /* the color from the theme */
00359     float *normal_color  = tip_colors[UI_TIP_LC_NORMAL];
00360     float *python_color  = tip_colors[UI_TIP_LC_PYTHON];
00361     float *alert_color   = tip_colors[UI_TIP_LC_ALERT];
00362     float *submenu_color = tip_colors[UI_TIP_LC_SUBMENU];
00363 
00364     float background_color[3];
00365     float tone_bg;
00366     int i;
00367 
00368     /* draw background */
00369     ui_draw_tooltip_background(UI_GetStyle(), NULL, &bbox);
00370 
00371     /* set background_color */
00372     rgb_uchar_to_float(background_color, (const unsigned char *)theme->inner);
00373 
00374     /* calculate normal_color */
00375     rgb_uchar_to_float(main_color, (const unsigned char *)theme->text);
00376     copy_v3_v3(normal_color, main_color);
00377     copy_v3_v3(python_color, main_color);
00378     copy_v3_v3(alert_color, main_color);
00379     copy_v3_v3(submenu_color, main_color);
00380 
00381     /* find the brightness difference between background and text colors */
00382     
00383     tone_bg = rgb_to_grayscale(background_color);
00384     /* tone_fg = rgb_to_grayscale(main_color); */
00385 
00386     rgb_tint(normal_color, 0.0f, 0.0f, tone_bg, 0.3f);   /* a shade darker (to bg) */
00387     rgb_tint(python_color, 0.666f, 0.25f, tone_bg, 0.3f); /* blue */
00388     rgb_tint(alert_color, 0.0f, 0.8f, tone_bg, 0.1f);    /* bright red */
00389     rgb_tint(submenu_color, 0.0f, 0.0f, tone_bg, 0.3f);  /* a shade darker (to bg) */
00390 
00391     /* draw text */
00392     uiStyleFontSet(&data->fstyle);
00393 
00394     bbox.ymax = bbox.ymax - 0.5f * ((bbox.ymax - bbox.ymin) - data->toth);
00395     bbox.ymin = bbox.ymax - data->lineh;
00396 
00397     for (i = 0; i < data->totline; i++) {
00398         glColor3fv(tip_colors[data->color_id[i]]);
00399         uiStyleFontDraw(&data->fstyle, &bbox, data->lines[i]);
00400         bbox.ymin -= data->lineh + data->spaceh;
00401         bbox.ymax -= data->lineh + data->spaceh;
00402     }
00403 }
00404 
00405 static void ui_tooltip_region_free_cb(ARegion *ar)
00406 {
00407     uiTooltipData *data;
00408 
00409     data = ar->regiondata;
00410     MEM_freeN(data);
00411     ar->regiondata = NULL;
00412 }
00413 
00414 ARegion *ui_tooltip_create(bContext *C, ARegion *butregion, uiBut *but)
00415 {
00416     uiStyle *style = UI_GetStyle();
00417     static ARegionType type;
00418     ARegion *ar;
00419     uiTooltipData *data;
00420     IDProperty *prop;
00421     char buf[512];
00422     float fonth, fontw, aspect = but->block->aspect;
00423     float x1f, x2f, y1f, y2f;
00424     int x1, x2, y1, y2, winx, winy, ofsx, ofsy, w, h, a;
00425 
00426     if (but->flag & UI_BUT_NO_TOOLTIP)
00427         return NULL;
00428 
00429     /* create tooltip data */
00430     data = MEM_callocN(sizeof(uiTooltipData), "uiTooltipData");
00431 
00432     /* special case, enum rna buttons only have enum item description, use general enum description too before the specific one */
00433     if (but->rnaprop && RNA_property_type(but->rnaprop) == PROP_ENUM) {
00434         const char *descr = RNA_property_description(but->rnaprop);
00435         if (descr && descr[0]) {
00436             BLI_strncpy(data->lines[data->totline], descr, sizeof(data->lines[0]));
00437             data->color_id[data->totline] = UI_TIP_LC_MAIN;
00438             data->totline++;
00439         }
00440 
00441         if (ELEM(but->type, ROW, MENU)) {
00442             EnumPropertyItem *item;
00443             int i, totitem, free;
00444             int value = (but->type == ROW) ? but->hardmax : ui_get_but_val(but);
00445 
00446             RNA_property_enum_items_gettexted(C, &but->rnapoin, but->rnaprop, &item, &totitem, &free);
00447 
00448             for (i = 0; i < totitem; i++) {
00449                 if (item[i].identifier[0] && item[i].value == value) {
00450                     if (item[i].description && item[i].description[0]) {
00451                         BLI_snprintf(data->lines[data->totline], sizeof(data->lines[0]), "%s: %s", item[i].name, item[i].description);
00452                         data->color_id[data->totline] = UI_TIP_LC_SUBMENU;
00453                         data->totline++;
00454                     }
00455                     break;
00456                 }
00457             }
00458 
00459             if (free) {
00460                 MEM_freeN(item);
00461             }
00462         }
00463     }
00464     
00465     if (but->tip && but->tip[0] != '\0') {
00466         BLI_strncpy(data->lines[data->totline], but->tip, sizeof(data->lines[0]));
00467         data->color_id[data->totline] = UI_TIP_LC_MAIN;
00468         data->totline++;
00469     }
00470 
00471     if (but->optype && !(but->block->flag & UI_BLOCK_LOOP)) {
00472         /* operator keymap (not menus, they already have it) */
00473         prop = (but->opptr) ? but->opptr->data : NULL;
00474 
00475         if (WM_key_event_operator_string(C, but->optype->idname, but->opcontext, prop, TRUE,
00476                                          buf, sizeof(buf)))
00477         {
00478             BLI_snprintf(data->lines[data->totline], sizeof(data->lines[0]), TIP_("Shortcut: %s"), buf);
00479             data->color_id[data->totline] = UI_TIP_LC_NORMAL;
00480             data->totline++;
00481         }
00482     }
00483 
00484     if (ELEM3(but->type, TEX, IDPOIN, SEARCH_MENU)) {
00485         /* full string */
00486         ui_get_but_string(but, buf, sizeof(buf));
00487         if (buf[0]) {
00488             BLI_snprintf(data->lines[data->totline], sizeof(data->lines[0]), TIP_("Value: %s"), buf);
00489             data->color_id[data->totline] = UI_TIP_LC_NORMAL;
00490             data->totline++;
00491         }
00492     }
00493 
00494     if (but->rnaprop) {
00495         int unit_type = uiButGetUnitType(but);
00496         
00497         if (unit_type == PROP_UNIT_ROTATION) {
00498             if (RNA_property_type(but->rnaprop) == PROP_FLOAT) {
00499                 float value = RNA_property_array_check(but->rnaprop) ? RNA_property_float_get_index(&but->rnapoin, but->rnaprop, but->rnaindex) : RNA_property_float_get(&but->rnapoin, but->rnaprop);
00500                 BLI_snprintf(data->lines[data->totline], sizeof(data->lines[0]), TIP_("Radians: %f"), value);
00501                 data->color_id[data->totline] = UI_TIP_LC_NORMAL;
00502                 data->totline++;
00503             }
00504         }
00505         
00506         if (but->flag & UI_BUT_DRIVEN) {
00507             if (ui_but_anim_expression_get(but, buf, sizeof(buf))) {
00508                 /* expression */
00509                 BLI_snprintf(data->lines[data->totline], sizeof(data->lines[0]), TIP_("Expression: %s"), buf);
00510                 data->color_id[data->totline] = UI_TIP_LC_NORMAL;
00511                 data->totline++;
00512             }
00513         }
00514 
00515         /* rna info */
00516         if ((U.flag & USER_TOOLTIPS_PYTHON) == 0) {
00517             BLI_snprintf(data->lines[data->totline], sizeof(data->lines[0]), TIP_("Python: %s.%s"), RNA_struct_identifier(but->rnapoin.type), RNA_property_identifier(but->rnaprop));
00518             data->color_id[data->totline] = UI_TIP_LC_PYTHON;
00519             data->totline++;
00520         }
00521         
00522         if (but->rnapoin.id.data) {
00523             ID *id = but->rnapoin.id.data;
00524             if (id->lib && id->lib->name) {
00525                 BLI_snprintf(data->lines[data->totline], sizeof(data->lines[0]), TIP_("Library: %s"), id->lib->name);
00526                 data->color_id[data->totline] = UI_TIP_LC_NORMAL;
00527                 data->totline++;
00528             }
00529         }
00530     }
00531     else if (but->optype) {
00532         PointerRNA *opptr;
00533         char *str;
00534         opptr = uiButGetOperatorPtrRNA(but); /* allocated when needed, the button owns it */
00535 
00536         str = WM_operator_pystring(C, but->optype, opptr, 0);
00537 
00538         /* operator info */
00539         if ((U.flag & USER_TOOLTIPS_PYTHON) == 0) {
00540             BLI_snprintf(data->lines[data->totline], sizeof(data->lines[0]), TIP_("Python: %s"), str);
00541             data->color_id[data->totline] = UI_TIP_LC_PYTHON;
00542             data->totline++;
00543         }
00544 
00545         MEM_freeN(str);
00546 
00547         /* second check if we are disabled - why */
00548         if (but->flag & UI_BUT_DISABLED) {
00549             const char *poll_msg;
00550             CTX_wm_operator_poll_msg_set(C, NULL);
00551             WM_operator_poll_context(C, but->optype, but->opcontext);
00552             poll_msg = CTX_wm_operator_poll_msg_get(C);
00553             if (poll_msg) {
00554                 BLI_snprintf(data->lines[data->totline], sizeof(data->lines[0]), TIP_("Disabled: %s"), poll_msg);
00555                 data->color_id[data->totline] = UI_TIP_LC_ALERT; /* alert */
00556                 data->totline++;            
00557             }
00558         }
00559     }
00560     else if (ELEM(but->type, MENU, PULLDOWN)) {
00561         if ((U.flag & USER_TOOLTIPS_PYTHON) == 0) {
00562             MenuType *mt = uiButGetMenuType(but);
00563             if (mt) {
00564                 BLI_snprintf(data->lines[data->totline], sizeof(data->lines[0]), TIP_("Python: %s"), mt->idname);
00565                 data->color_id[data->totline] = UI_TIP_LC_PYTHON;
00566                 data->totline++;
00567             }
00568         }
00569 
00570     }
00571 
00572     assert(data->totline < MAX_TOOLTIP_LINES);
00573     
00574     if (data->totline == 0) {
00575         MEM_freeN(data);
00576         return NULL;
00577     }
00578 
00579     /* create area region */
00580     ar = ui_add_temporary_region(CTX_wm_screen(C));
00581 
00582     memset(&type, 0, sizeof(ARegionType));
00583     type.draw = ui_tooltip_region_draw_cb;
00584     type.free = ui_tooltip_region_free_cb;
00585     ar->type = &type;
00586     
00587     /* set font, get bb */
00588     data->fstyle = style->widget; /* copy struct */
00589     data->fstyle.align = UI_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER;
00590     uiStyleFontSet(&data->fstyle);
00591 
00592     /* these defines may need to be tweaked depending on font */
00593 #define TIP_MARGIN_Y 2
00594 #define TIP_BORDER_X 16.0f
00595 #define TIP_BORDER_Y 6.0f
00596 
00597     h = BLF_height_max(data->fstyle.uifont_id);
00598 
00599     for (a = 0, fontw = 0, fonth = 0; a < data->totline; a++) {
00600         w = BLF_width(data->fstyle.uifont_id, data->lines[a]);
00601         fontw = MAX2(fontw, w);
00602         fonth += (a == 0) ? h : h + TIP_MARGIN_Y;
00603     }
00604 
00605     fontw *= aspect;
00606 
00607     ar->regiondata = data;
00608 
00609     data->toth = fonth;
00610     data->lineh = h;
00611     data->spaceh = TIP_MARGIN_Y;
00612 
00613 
00614     /* compute position */
00615     ofsx = (but->block->panel) ? but->block->panel->ofsx : 0;
00616     ofsy = (but->block->panel) ? but->block->panel->ofsy : 0;
00617 
00618     x1f = (but->x1 + but->x2) * 0.5f + ofsx - (TIP_BORDER_X * aspect);
00619     x2f = x1f + fontw + (TIP_BORDER_X * aspect);
00620     y2f = but->y1 + ofsy - (TIP_BORDER_Y * aspect);
00621     y1f = y2f - fonth * aspect - (TIP_BORDER_Y * aspect);
00622     
00623 #undef TIP_MARGIN_Y
00624 #undef TIP_BORDER_X
00625 #undef TIP_BORDER_Y
00626 
00627     /* copy to int, gets projected if possible too */
00628     x1 = x1f; y1 = y1f; x2 = x2f; y2 = y2f;
00629     
00630     if (butregion) {
00631         /* XXX temp, region v2ds can be empty still */
00632         if (butregion->v2d.cur.xmin != butregion->v2d.cur.xmax) {
00633             UI_view2d_to_region_no_clip(&butregion->v2d, x1f, y1f, &x1, &y1);
00634             UI_view2d_to_region_no_clip(&butregion->v2d, x2f, y2f, &x2, &y2);
00635         }
00636 
00637         x1 += butregion->winrct.xmin;
00638         x2 += butregion->winrct.xmin;
00639         y1 += butregion->winrct.ymin;
00640         y2 += butregion->winrct.ymin;
00641     }
00642 
00643     wm_window_get_size(CTX_wm_window(C), &winx, &winy);
00644 
00645     if (x2 > winx) {
00646         /* super size */
00647         if (x2 > winx + x1) {
00648             x2 = winx;
00649             x1 = 0;
00650         }
00651         else {
00652             x1 -= x2 - winx;
00653             x2 = winx;
00654         }
00655     }
00656     /* ensure at least 5 px above screen bounds
00657      * 25 is just a guess to be above the menu item */
00658     if (y1 < 5) {
00659         y2 += (-y1) + 30;
00660         y1 = 30;
00661     }
00662 
00663     /* widget rect, in region coords */
00664     data->bbox.xmin = MENU_SHADOW_SIDE;
00665     data->bbox.xmax = x2 - x1 + MENU_SHADOW_SIDE;
00666     data->bbox.ymin = MENU_SHADOW_BOTTOM;
00667     data->bbox.ymax = y2 - y1 + MENU_SHADOW_BOTTOM;
00668     
00669     /* region bigger for shadow */
00670     ar->winrct.xmin = x1 - MENU_SHADOW_SIDE;
00671     ar->winrct.xmax = x2 + MENU_SHADOW_SIDE;
00672     ar->winrct.ymin = y1 - MENU_SHADOW_BOTTOM;
00673     ar->winrct.ymax = y2 + MENU_TOP;
00674 
00675     /* adds subwindow */
00676     ED_region_init(C, ar);
00677     
00678     /* notify change and redraw */
00679     ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00680 
00681     return ar;
00682 }
00683 
00684 void ui_tooltip_free(bContext *C, ARegion *ar)
00685 {
00686     ui_remove_temporary_region(C, CTX_wm_screen(C), ar);
00687 }
00688 
00689 
00690 /************************* Creating Search Box **********************/
00691 
00692 struct uiSearchItems {
00693     int maxitem, totitem, maxstrlen;
00694     
00695     int offset, offset_i; /* offset for inserting in array */
00696     int more;  /* flag indicating there are more items */
00697     
00698     char **names;
00699     void **pointers;
00700     int *icons;
00701 
00702     AutoComplete *autocpl;
00703     void *active;
00704 };
00705 
00706 typedef struct uiSearchboxData {
00707     rcti bbox;
00708     uiFontStyle fstyle;
00709     uiSearchItems items;
00710     int active;     /* index in items array */
00711     int noback;     /* when menu opened with enough space for this */
00712     int preview;    /* draw thumbnail previews, rather than list */
00713     int prv_rows, prv_cols;
00714 } uiSearchboxData;
00715 
00716 #define SEARCH_ITEMS    10
00717 
00718 /* exported for use by search callbacks */
00719 /* returns zero if nothing to add */
00720 int uiSearchItemAdd(uiSearchItems *items, const char *name, void *poin, int iconid)
00721 {
00722     /* hijack for autocomplete */
00723     if (items->autocpl) {
00724         autocomplete_do_name(items->autocpl, name);
00725         return 1;
00726     }
00727     
00728     /* hijack for finding active item */
00729     if (items->active) {
00730         if (poin == items->active)
00731             items->offset_i = items->totitem;
00732         items->totitem++;
00733         return 1;
00734     }
00735     
00736     if (items->totitem >= items->maxitem) {
00737         items->more = 1;
00738         return 0;
00739     }
00740     
00741     /* skip first items in list */
00742     if (items->offset_i > 0) {
00743         items->offset_i--;
00744         return 1;
00745     }
00746     
00747     if (items->names)
00748         BLI_strncpy(items->names[items->totitem], name, items->maxstrlen);
00749     if (items->pointers)
00750         items->pointers[items->totitem] = poin;
00751     if (items->icons)
00752         items->icons[items->totitem] = iconid;
00753     
00754     items->totitem++;
00755     
00756     return 1;
00757 }
00758 
00759 int uiSearchBoxhHeight(void)
00760 {
00761     return SEARCH_ITEMS * UI_UNIT_Y + 2 * MENU_TOP;
00762 }
00763 
00764 /* ar is the search box itself */
00765 static void ui_searchbox_select(bContext *C, ARegion *ar, uiBut *but, int step)
00766 {
00767     uiSearchboxData *data = ar->regiondata;
00768     
00769     /* apply step */
00770     data->active += step;
00771     
00772     if (data->items.totitem == 0)
00773         data->active = 0;
00774     else if (data->active > data->items.totitem) {
00775         if (data->items.more) {
00776             data->items.offset++;
00777             data->active = data->items.totitem;
00778             ui_searchbox_update(C, ar, but, 0);
00779         }
00780         else
00781             data->active = data->items.totitem;
00782     }
00783     else if (data->active < 1) {
00784         if (data->items.offset) {
00785             data->items.offset--;
00786             data->active = 1;
00787             ui_searchbox_update(C, ar, but, 0);
00788         }
00789         else if (data->active < 0)
00790             data->active = 0;
00791     }
00792     
00793     ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00794 }
00795 
00796 static void ui_searchbox_butrect(rcti *rect, uiSearchboxData *data, int itemnr)
00797 {
00798     /* thumbnail preview */
00799     if (data->preview) {
00800         int buth = (data->bbox.ymax - data->bbox.ymin - 2 * MENU_TOP) / data->prv_rows;
00801         int butw = (data->bbox.xmax - data->bbox.xmin) / data->prv_cols;
00802         int row, col;
00803         
00804         *rect = data->bbox;
00805         
00806         col = itemnr % data->prv_cols;
00807         row = itemnr / data->prv_cols;
00808         
00809         rect->xmin += col * butw;
00810         rect->xmax = rect->xmin + butw;
00811         
00812         rect->ymax = data->bbox.ymax - MENU_TOP - (row * buth);
00813         rect->ymin = rect->ymax - buth;
00814     }
00815     /* list view */
00816     else {
00817         int buth = (data->bbox.ymax - data->bbox.ymin - 2 * MENU_TOP) / SEARCH_ITEMS;
00818         
00819         *rect = data->bbox;
00820         rect->xmin = data->bbox.xmin + 3.0f;
00821         rect->xmax = data->bbox.xmax - 3.0f;
00822         
00823         rect->ymax = data->bbox.ymax - MENU_TOP - itemnr * buth;
00824         rect->ymin = rect->ymax - buth;
00825     }
00826     
00827 }
00828 
00829 /* x and y in screencoords */
00830 int ui_searchbox_inside(ARegion *ar, int x, int y)
00831 {
00832     uiSearchboxData *data = ar->regiondata;
00833     
00834     return(BLI_in_rcti(&data->bbox, x - ar->winrct.xmin, y - ar->winrct.ymin));
00835 }
00836 
00837 /* string validated to be of correct length (but->hardmax) */
00838 void ui_searchbox_apply(uiBut *but, ARegion *ar)
00839 {
00840     uiSearchboxData *data = ar->regiondata;
00841 
00842     but->func_arg2 = NULL;
00843     
00844     if (data->active) {
00845         char *name = data->items.names[data->active - 1];
00846         char *cpoin = strchr(name, '|');
00847         
00848         if (cpoin) cpoin[0] = 0;
00849         BLI_strncpy(but->editstr, name, data->items.maxstrlen);
00850         if (cpoin) cpoin[0] = '|';
00851         
00852         but->func_arg2 = data->items.pointers[data->active - 1];
00853     }
00854 }
00855 
00856 void ui_searchbox_event(bContext *C, ARegion *ar, uiBut *but, wmEvent *event)
00857 {
00858     uiSearchboxData *data = ar->regiondata;
00859     
00860     switch (event->type) {
00861         case WHEELUPMOUSE:
00862         case UPARROWKEY:
00863             ui_searchbox_select(C, ar, but, -1);
00864             break;
00865         case WHEELDOWNMOUSE:
00866         case DOWNARROWKEY:
00867             ui_searchbox_select(C, ar, but, 1);
00868             break;
00869         case MOUSEMOVE:
00870             if (BLI_in_rcti(&ar->winrct, event->x, event->y)) {
00871                 rcti rect;
00872                 int a;
00873                 
00874                 for (a = 0; a < data->items.totitem; a++) {
00875                     ui_searchbox_butrect(&rect, data, a);
00876                     if (BLI_in_rcti(&rect, event->x - ar->winrct.xmin, event->y - ar->winrct.ymin)) {
00877                         if (data->active != a + 1) {
00878                             data->active = a + 1;
00879                             ui_searchbox_select(C, ar, but, 0);
00880                             break;
00881                         }
00882                     }
00883                 }
00884             }
00885             break;
00886     }
00887 }
00888 
00889 /* ar is the search box itself */
00890 void ui_searchbox_update(bContext *C, ARegion *ar, uiBut *but, int reset)
00891 {
00892     uiSearchboxData *data = ar->regiondata;
00893     
00894     /* reset vars */
00895     data->items.totitem = 0;
00896     data->items.more = 0;
00897     if (reset == 0) {
00898         data->items.offset_i = data->items.offset;
00899     }
00900     else {
00901         data->items.offset_i = data->items.offset = 0;
00902         data->active = 0;
00903         
00904         /* handle active */
00905         if (but->search_func && but->func_arg2) {
00906             data->items.active = but->func_arg2;
00907             but->search_func(C, but->search_arg, but->editstr, &data->items);
00908             data->items.active = NULL;
00909             
00910             /* found active item, calculate real offset by centering it */
00911             if (data->items.totitem) {
00912                 /* first case, begin of list */
00913                 if (data->items.offset_i < data->items.maxitem) {
00914                     data->active = data->items.offset_i + 1;
00915                     data->items.offset_i = 0;
00916                 }
00917                 else {
00918                     /* second case, end of list */
00919                     if (data->items.totitem - data->items.offset_i <= data->items.maxitem) {
00920                         data->active = 1 + data->items.offset_i - data->items.totitem + data->items.maxitem;
00921                         data->items.offset_i = data->items.totitem - data->items.maxitem;
00922                     }
00923                     else {
00924                         /* center active item */
00925                         data->items.offset_i -= data->items.maxitem / 2;
00926                         data->active = 1 + data->items.maxitem / 2;
00927                     }
00928                 }
00929             }
00930             data->items.offset = data->items.offset_i;
00931             data->items.totitem = 0;
00932         }
00933     }
00934     
00935     /* callback */
00936     if (but->search_func)
00937         but->search_func(C, but->search_arg, but->editstr, &data->items);
00938     
00939     /* handle case where editstr is equal to one of items */
00940     if (reset && data->active == 0) {
00941         int a;
00942         
00943         for (a = 0; a < data->items.totitem; a++) {
00944             char *cpoin = strchr(data->items.names[a], '|');
00945             
00946             if (cpoin) cpoin[0] = 0;
00947             if (0 == strcmp(but->editstr, data->items.names[a]))
00948                 data->active = a + 1;
00949             if (cpoin) cpoin[0] = '|';
00950         }
00951         if (data->items.totitem == 1 && but->editstr[0])
00952             data->active = 1;
00953     }
00954 
00955     /* validate selected item */
00956     ui_searchbox_select(C, ar, but, 0);
00957     
00958     ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00959 }
00960 
00961 void ui_searchbox_autocomplete(bContext *C, ARegion *ar, uiBut *but, char *str)
00962 {
00963     uiSearchboxData *data = ar->regiondata;
00964 
00965     if (str[0]) {
00966         data->items.autocpl = autocomplete_begin(str, ui_get_but_string_max_length(but));
00967 
00968         but->search_func(C, but->search_arg, but->editstr, &data->items);
00969 
00970         autocomplete_end(data->items.autocpl, str);
00971         data->items.autocpl = NULL;
00972     }
00973 }
00974 
00975 static void ui_searchbox_region_draw_cb(const bContext *UNUSED(C), ARegion *ar)
00976 {
00977     uiSearchboxData *data = ar->regiondata;
00978     
00979     /* pixel space */
00980     wmOrtho2(-0.01f, ar->winx - 0.01f, -0.01f, ar->winy - 0.01f);
00981 
00982     if (!data->noback)
00983         ui_draw_search_back(NULL, NULL, &data->bbox);  /* style not used yet */
00984     
00985     /* draw text */
00986     if (data->items.totitem) {
00987         rcti rect;
00988         int a;
00989         
00990         if (data->preview) {
00991             /* draw items */
00992             for (a = 0; a < data->items.totitem; a++) {
00993                 ui_searchbox_butrect(&rect, data, a);
00994                 
00995                 /* widget itself */
00996                 if (data->preview)
00997                     ui_draw_preview_item(&data->fstyle, &rect, data->items.names[a], data->items.icons[a], (a + 1) == data->active ? UI_ACTIVE : 0);
00998                 else 
00999                     ui_draw_menu_item(&data->fstyle, &rect, data->items.names[a], data->items.icons[a], (a + 1) == data->active ? UI_ACTIVE : 0);
01000             }
01001             
01002             /* indicate more */
01003             if (data->items.more) {
01004                 ui_searchbox_butrect(&rect, data, data->items.maxitem - 1);
01005                 glEnable(GL_BLEND);
01006                 UI_icon_draw(rect.xmax - 18, rect.ymin - 7, ICON_TRIA_DOWN);
01007                 glDisable(GL_BLEND);
01008             }
01009             if (data->items.offset) {
01010                 ui_searchbox_butrect(&rect, data, 0);
01011                 glEnable(GL_BLEND);
01012                 UI_icon_draw(rect.xmin, rect.ymax - 9, ICON_TRIA_UP);
01013                 glDisable(GL_BLEND);
01014             }
01015             
01016         }
01017         else {
01018             /* draw items */
01019             for (a = 0; a < data->items.totitem; a++) {
01020                 ui_searchbox_butrect(&rect, data, a);
01021                 
01022                 /* widget itself */
01023                 ui_draw_menu_item(&data->fstyle, &rect, data->items.names[a], data->items.icons[a], (a + 1) == data->active ? UI_ACTIVE : 0);
01024                 
01025             }
01026             /* indicate more */
01027             if (data->items.more) {
01028                 ui_searchbox_butrect(&rect, data, data->items.maxitem - 1);
01029                 glEnable(GL_BLEND);
01030                 UI_icon_draw((rect.xmax - rect.xmin) / 2, rect.ymin - 9, ICON_TRIA_DOWN);
01031                 glDisable(GL_BLEND);
01032             }
01033             if (data->items.offset) {
01034                 ui_searchbox_butrect(&rect, data, 0);
01035                 glEnable(GL_BLEND);
01036                 UI_icon_draw((rect.xmax - rect.xmin) / 2, rect.ymax - 7, ICON_TRIA_UP);
01037                 glDisable(GL_BLEND);
01038             }
01039         }
01040     }
01041 }
01042 
01043 static void ui_searchbox_region_free_cb(ARegion *ar)
01044 {
01045     uiSearchboxData *data = ar->regiondata;
01046     int a;
01047 
01048     /* free search data */
01049     for (a = 0; a < data->items.maxitem; a++) {
01050         MEM_freeN(data->items.names[a]);
01051     }
01052     MEM_freeN(data->items.names);
01053     MEM_freeN(data->items.pointers);
01054     MEM_freeN(data->items.icons);
01055     
01056     MEM_freeN(data);
01057     ar->regiondata = NULL;
01058 }
01059 
01060 ARegion *ui_searchbox_create(bContext *C, ARegion *butregion, uiBut *but)
01061 {
01062     uiStyle *style = UI_GetStyle();
01063     static ARegionType type;
01064     ARegion *ar;
01065     uiSearchboxData *data;
01066     float aspect = but->block->aspect;
01067     float x1f, x2f, y1f, y2f;
01068     int x1, x2, y1, y2, winx, winy, ofsx, ofsy;
01069     
01070     /* create area region */
01071     ar = ui_add_temporary_region(CTX_wm_screen(C));
01072     
01073     memset(&type, 0, sizeof(ARegionType));
01074     type.draw = ui_searchbox_region_draw_cb;
01075     type.free = ui_searchbox_region_free_cb;
01076     ar->type = &type;
01077     
01078     /* create searchbox data */
01079     data = MEM_callocN(sizeof(uiSearchboxData), "uiSearchboxData");
01080 
01081     /* set font, get bb */
01082     data->fstyle = style->widget; /* copy struct */
01083     data->fstyle.align = UI_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER;
01084     ui_fontscale(&data->fstyle.points, aspect);
01085     uiStyleFontSet(&data->fstyle);
01086     
01087     ar->regiondata = data;
01088     
01089     /* special case, hardcoded feature, not draw backdrop when called from menus,
01090      * assume for design that popup already added it */
01091     if (but->block->flag & UI_BLOCK_LOOP)
01092         data->noback = 1;
01093     
01094     if (but->a1 > 0 && but->a2 > 0) {
01095         data->preview = 1;
01096         data->prv_rows = but->a1;
01097         data->prv_cols = but->a2;
01098     }
01099     
01100     /* compute position */
01101     if (but->block->flag & UI_BLOCK_LOOP) {
01102         /* this case is search menu inside other menu */
01103         /* we copy region size */
01104 
01105         ar->winrct = butregion->winrct;
01106         
01107         /* widget rect, in region coords */
01108         data->bbox.xmin = MENU_SHADOW_SIDE;
01109         data->bbox.xmax = (ar->winrct.xmax - ar->winrct.xmin) - MENU_SHADOW_SIDE;
01110         data->bbox.ymin = MENU_SHADOW_BOTTOM;
01111         data->bbox.ymax = (ar->winrct.ymax - ar->winrct.ymin) - MENU_SHADOW_BOTTOM;
01112         
01113         /* check if button is lower half */
01114         if (but->y2 < (but->block->miny + but->block->maxy) / 2) {
01115             data->bbox.ymin += (but->y2 - but->y1);
01116         }
01117         else {
01118             data->bbox.ymax -= (but->y2 - but->y1);
01119         }
01120     }
01121     else {
01122         x1f = but->x1 - 5;   /* align text with button */
01123         x2f = but->x2 + 5;   /* symmetrical */
01124         y2f = but->y1;
01125         y1f = y2f - uiSearchBoxhHeight();
01126 
01127         ofsx = (but->block->panel) ? but->block->panel->ofsx : 0;
01128         ofsy = (but->block->panel) ? but->block->panel->ofsy : 0;
01129 
01130         x1f += ofsx;
01131         x2f += ofsx;
01132         y1f += ofsy;
01133         y2f += ofsy;
01134     
01135         /* minimal width */
01136         if (x2f - x1f < 150) x2f = x1f + 150;  // XXX arbitrary
01137         
01138         /* copy to int, gets projected if possible too */
01139         x1 = x1f; y1 = y1f; x2 = x2f; y2 = y2f;
01140         
01141         if (butregion->v2d.cur.xmin != butregion->v2d.cur.xmax) {
01142             UI_view2d_to_region_no_clip(&butregion->v2d, x1f, y1f, &x1, &y1);
01143             UI_view2d_to_region_no_clip(&butregion->v2d, x2f, y2f, &x2, &y2);
01144         }
01145 
01146         x1 += butregion->winrct.xmin;
01147         x2 += butregion->winrct.xmin;
01148         y1 += butregion->winrct.ymin;
01149         y2 += butregion->winrct.ymin;
01150 
01151         wm_window_get_size(CTX_wm_window(C), &winx, &winy);
01152         
01153         if (x2 > winx) {
01154             /* super size */
01155             if (x2 > winx + x1) {
01156                 x2 = winx;
01157                 x1 = 0;
01158             }
01159             else {
01160                 x1 -= x2 - winx;
01161                 x2 = winx;
01162             }
01163         }
01164 
01165         if (y1 < 0) {
01166             int newy1;
01167             UI_view2d_to_region_no_clip(&butregion->v2d, 0, but->y2 + ofsy, NULL, &newy1);
01168             newy1 += butregion->winrct.ymin;
01169 
01170             y2 = y2 - y1 + newy1;
01171             y1 = newy1;
01172         }
01173 
01174         /* widget rect, in region coords */
01175         data->bbox.xmin = MENU_SHADOW_SIDE;
01176         data->bbox.xmax = x2 - x1 + MENU_SHADOW_SIDE;
01177         data->bbox.ymin = MENU_SHADOW_BOTTOM;
01178         data->bbox.ymax = y2 - y1 + MENU_SHADOW_BOTTOM;
01179         
01180         /* region bigger for shadow */
01181         ar->winrct.xmin = x1 - MENU_SHADOW_SIDE;
01182         ar->winrct.xmax = x2 + MENU_SHADOW_SIDE;
01183         ar->winrct.ymin = y1 - MENU_SHADOW_BOTTOM;
01184         ar->winrct.ymax = y2;
01185     }
01186     
01187     /* adds subwindow */
01188     ED_region_init(C, ar);
01189     
01190     /* notify change and redraw */
01191     ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
01192     
01193     /* prepare search data */
01194     if (data->preview) {
01195         data->items.maxitem = data->prv_rows * data->prv_cols;
01196     }
01197     else {
01198         data->items.maxitem = SEARCH_ITEMS;
01199     }
01200     data->items.maxstrlen = but->hardmax;
01201     data->items.totitem = 0;
01202     data->items.names = MEM_callocN(data->items.maxitem * sizeof(void *), "search names");
01203     data->items.pointers = MEM_callocN(data->items.maxitem * sizeof(void *), "search pointers");
01204     data->items.icons = MEM_callocN(data->items.maxitem * sizeof(int), "search icons");
01205     for (x1 = 0; x1 < data->items.maxitem; x1++)
01206         data->items.names[x1] = MEM_callocN(but->hardmax + 1, "search pointers");
01207     
01208     return ar;
01209 }
01210 
01211 void ui_searchbox_free(bContext *C, ARegion *ar)
01212 {
01213     ui_remove_temporary_region(C, CTX_wm_screen(C), ar);
01214 }
01215 
01216 /* sets red alert if button holds a string it can't find */
01217 /* XXX weak: search_func adds all partial matches... */
01218 void ui_but_search_test(uiBut *but)
01219 {
01220     uiSearchItems *items;
01221     int x1;
01222 
01223     /* possibly very large lists (such as ID datablocks) only
01224      * only validate string RNA buts (not pointers) */
01225     if (but->rnaprop && RNA_property_type(but->rnaprop) != PROP_STRING) {
01226         return;
01227     }
01228 
01229     items = MEM_callocN(sizeof(uiSearchItems), "search items");
01230 
01231     /* setup search struct */
01232     items->maxitem = 10;
01233     items->maxstrlen = 256;
01234     items->names = MEM_callocN(items->maxitem * sizeof(void *), "search names");
01235     for (x1 = 0; x1 < items->maxitem; x1++)
01236         items->names[x1] = MEM_callocN(but->hardmax + 1, "search names");
01237     
01238     but->search_func(but->block->evil_C, but->search_arg, but->drawstr, items);
01239     
01240     /* only redalert when we are sure of it, this can miss cases when >10 matches */
01241     if (items->totitem == 0)
01242         uiButSetFlag(but, UI_BUT_REDALERT);
01243     else if (items->more == 0) {
01244         for (x1 = 0; x1 < items->totitem; x1++)
01245             if (strcmp(but->drawstr, items->names[x1]) == 0)
01246                 break;
01247         if (x1 == items->totitem)
01248             uiButSetFlag(but, UI_BUT_REDALERT);
01249     }
01250     
01251     for (x1 = 0; x1 < items->maxitem; x1++) {
01252         MEM_freeN(items->names[x1]);
01253     }
01254     MEM_freeN(items->names);
01255     MEM_freeN(items);
01256 }
01257 
01258 
01259 /************************* Creating Menu Blocks **********************/
01260 
01261 /* position block relative to but, result is in window space */
01262 static void ui_block_position(wmWindow *window, ARegion *butregion, uiBut *but, uiBlock *block)
01263 {
01264     uiBut *bt;
01265     uiSafetyRct *saferct;
01266     rctf butrct;
01267     /*float aspect;*/ /*UNUSED*/
01268     int xsize, ysize, xof = 0, yof = 0, center;
01269     short dir1 = 0, dir2 = 0;
01270     
01271     /* transform to window coordinates, using the source button region/block */
01272     butrct.xmin = but->x1; butrct.xmax = but->x2;
01273     butrct.ymin = but->y1; butrct.ymax = but->y2;
01274 
01275     ui_block_to_window_fl(butregion, but->block, &butrct.xmin, &butrct.ymin);
01276     ui_block_to_window_fl(butregion, but->block, &butrct.xmax, &butrct.ymax);
01277 
01278     /* calc block rect */
01279     if (block->minx == 0.0f && block->maxx == 0.0f) {
01280         if (block->buttons.first) {
01281             block->minx = block->miny = 10000;
01282             block->maxx = block->maxy = -10000;
01283             
01284             bt = block->buttons.first;
01285             while (bt) {
01286                 if (bt->x1 < block->minx) block->minx = bt->x1;
01287                 if (bt->y1 < block->miny) block->miny = bt->y1;
01288 
01289                 if (bt->x2 > block->maxx) block->maxx = bt->x2;
01290                 if (bt->y2 > block->maxy) block->maxy = bt->y2;
01291                 
01292                 bt = bt->next;
01293             }
01294         }
01295         else {
01296             /* we're nice and allow empty blocks too */
01297             block->minx = block->miny = 0;
01298             block->maxx = block->maxy = 20;
01299         }
01300     }
01301     
01302     /*aspect= (float)(block->maxx - block->minx + 4);*/ /*UNUSED*/
01303     ui_block_to_window_fl(butregion, but->block, &block->minx, &block->miny);
01304     ui_block_to_window_fl(butregion, but->block, &block->maxx, &block->maxy);
01305 
01306     //block->minx-= 2.0; block->miny-= 2.0;
01307     //block->maxx+= 2.0; block->maxy+= 2.0;
01308     
01309     xsize = block->maxx - block->minx + 4; // 4 for shadow
01310     ysize = block->maxy - block->miny + 4;
01311     /*aspect/= (float)xsize;*/ /*UNUSED*/
01312 
01313     {
01314         int left = 0, right = 0, top = 0, down = 0;
01315         int winx, winy;
01316         // int offscreen;
01317 
01318         wm_window_get_size(window, &winx, &winy);
01319 
01320         if (block->direction & UI_CENTER) center = ysize / 2;
01321         else center = 0;
01322         
01323         /* check if there's space at all */
01324         if (butrct.xmin - xsize > 0.0f) left = 1;
01325         if (butrct.xmax + xsize < winx) right = 1;
01326         if (butrct.ymin - ysize + center > 0.0f) down = 1;
01327         if (butrct.ymax + ysize - center < winy) top = 1;
01328 
01329         if (top == 0 && down == 0) {
01330             if (butrct.ymin - ysize < winy - butrct.ymax - ysize)
01331                 top = 1;
01332             else
01333                 down = 1;
01334         }
01335         
01336         dir1 = block->direction & UI_DIRECTION;
01337 
01338         /* secundary directions */
01339         if (dir1 & (UI_TOP | UI_DOWN)) {
01340             if (dir1 & UI_LEFT) dir2 = UI_LEFT;
01341             else if (dir1 & UI_RIGHT) dir2 = UI_RIGHT;
01342             dir1 &= (UI_TOP | UI_DOWN);
01343         }
01344 
01345         if (dir2 == 0) if (dir1 == UI_LEFT || dir1 == UI_RIGHT) dir2 = UI_DOWN;
01346         if (dir2 == 0) if (dir1 == UI_TOP || dir1 == UI_DOWN) dir2 = UI_LEFT;
01347         
01348         /* no space at all? don't change */
01349         if (left || right) {
01350             if (dir1 == UI_LEFT && left == 0) dir1 = UI_RIGHT;
01351             if (dir1 == UI_RIGHT && right == 0) dir1 = UI_LEFT;
01352             /* this is aligning, not append! */
01353             if (dir2 == UI_LEFT && right == 0) dir2 = UI_RIGHT;
01354             if (dir2 == UI_RIGHT && left == 0) dir2 = UI_LEFT;
01355         }
01356         if (down || top) {
01357             if (dir1 == UI_TOP && top == 0) dir1 = UI_DOWN;
01358             if (dir1 == UI_DOWN && down == 0) dir1 = UI_TOP;
01359             if (dir2 == UI_TOP && top == 0) dir2 = UI_DOWN;
01360             if (dir2 == UI_DOWN && down == 0) dir2 = UI_TOP;
01361         }
01362 
01363         if (dir1 == UI_LEFT) {
01364             xof = butrct.xmin - block->maxx;
01365             if (dir2 == UI_TOP) yof = butrct.ymin - block->miny - center;
01366             else yof = butrct.ymax - block->maxy + center;
01367         }
01368         else if (dir1 == UI_RIGHT) {
01369             xof = butrct.xmax - block->minx;
01370             if (dir2 == UI_TOP) yof = butrct.ymin - block->miny - center;
01371             else yof = butrct.ymax - block->maxy + center;
01372         }
01373         else if (dir1 == UI_TOP) {
01374             yof = butrct.ymax - block->miny;
01375             if (dir2 == UI_RIGHT) xof = butrct.xmax - block->maxx;
01376             else xof = butrct.xmin - block->minx;
01377             // changed direction? 
01378             if ((dir1 & block->direction) == 0) {
01379                 if (block->direction & UI_SHIFT_FLIPPED)
01380                     xof += dir2 == UI_LEFT ? 25 : -25;
01381                 uiBlockFlipOrder(block);
01382             }
01383         }
01384         else if (dir1 == UI_DOWN) {
01385             yof = butrct.ymin - block->maxy;
01386             if (dir2 == UI_RIGHT) xof = butrct.xmax - block->maxx;
01387             else xof = butrct.xmin - block->minx;
01388             // changed direction?
01389             if ((dir1 & block->direction) == 0) {
01390                 if (block->direction & UI_SHIFT_FLIPPED)
01391                     xof += dir2 == UI_LEFT ? 25 : -25;
01392                 uiBlockFlipOrder(block);
01393             }
01394         }
01395 
01396         /* and now we handle the exception; no space below or to top */
01397         if (top == 0 && down == 0) {
01398             if (dir1 == UI_LEFT || dir1 == UI_RIGHT) {
01399                 // align with bottom of screen 
01400                 // yof= ysize; (not with menu scrolls)
01401             }
01402         }
01403         
01404         /* or no space left or right */
01405         if (left == 0 && right == 0) {
01406             if (dir1 == UI_TOP || dir1 == UI_DOWN) {
01407                 // align with left size of screen 
01408                 xof = -block->minx + 5;
01409             }
01410         }
01411         
01412         // apply requested offset in the block
01413         xof += block->xofs / block->aspect;
01414         yof += block->yofs / block->aspect;
01415 #if 0
01416         /* clamp to window bounds, could be made into an option if its ever annoying */
01417         if (     (offscreen = (block->miny + yof)) < 0) yof -= offscreen;   /* bottom */
01418         else if ((offscreen = (block->maxy + yof) - winy) > 0) yof -= offscreen;  /* top */
01419         if (     (offscreen = (block->minx + xof)) < 0) xof -= offscreen;   /* left */
01420         else if ((offscreen = (block->maxx + xof) - winx) > 0) xof -= offscreen;  /* right */
01421 #endif
01422     }
01423     
01424     /* apply offset, buttons in window coords */
01425     
01426     for (bt = block->buttons.first; bt; bt = bt->next) {
01427         ui_block_to_window_fl(butregion, but->block, &bt->x1, &bt->y1);
01428         ui_block_to_window_fl(butregion, but->block, &bt->x2, &bt->y2);
01429 
01430         bt->x1 += xof;
01431         bt->x2 += xof;
01432         bt->y1 += yof;
01433         bt->y2 += yof;
01434 
01435         bt->aspect = 1.0;
01436         // ui_check_but recalculates drawstring size in pixels
01437         ui_check_but(bt);
01438     }
01439     
01440     block->minx += xof;
01441     block->miny += yof;
01442     block->maxx += xof;
01443     block->maxy += yof;
01444 
01445     /* safety calculus */
01446     if (but) {
01447         float midx = (butrct.xmin + butrct.xmax) / 2.0f;
01448         float midy = (butrct.ymin + butrct.ymax) / 2.0f;
01449         
01450         /* when you are outside parent button, safety there should be smaller */
01451         
01452         // parent button to left
01453         if (midx < block->minx) block->safety.xmin = block->minx - 3;
01454         else block->safety.xmin = block->minx - 40;
01455         // parent button to right
01456         if (midx > block->maxx) block->safety.xmax = block->maxx + 3;
01457         else block->safety.xmax = block->maxx + 40;
01458         
01459         // parent button on bottom
01460         if (midy < block->miny) block->safety.ymin = block->miny - 3;
01461         else block->safety.ymin = block->miny - 40;
01462         // parent button on top
01463         if (midy > block->maxy) block->safety.ymax = block->maxy + 3;
01464         else block->safety.ymax = block->maxy + 40;
01465         
01466         // exception for switched pulldowns...
01467         if (dir1 && (dir1 & block->direction) == 0) {
01468             if (dir2 == UI_RIGHT) block->safety.xmax = block->maxx + 3;
01469             if (dir2 == UI_LEFT) block->safety.xmin = block->minx - 3;
01470         }
01471         block->direction = dir1;
01472     }
01473     else {
01474         block->safety.xmin = block->minx - 40;
01475         block->safety.ymin = block->miny - 40;
01476         block->safety.xmax = block->maxx + 40;
01477         block->safety.ymax = block->maxy + 40;
01478     }
01479 
01480     /* keep a list of these, needed for pulldown menus */
01481     saferct = MEM_callocN(sizeof(uiSafetyRct), "uiSafetyRct");
01482     saferct->parent = butrct;
01483     saferct->safety = block->safety;
01484     BLI_freelistN(&block->saferct);
01485     if (but)
01486         BLI_duplicatelist(&block->saferct, &but->block->saferct);
01487     BLI_addhead(&block->saferct, saferct);
01488 }
01489 
01490 static void ui_block_region_draw(const bContext *C, ARegion *ar)
01491 {
01492     uiBlock *block;
01493 
01494     for (block = ar->uiblocks.first; block; block = block->next)
01495         uiDrawBlock(C, block);
01496 }
01497 
01498 static void ui_popup_block_clip(wmWindow *window, uiBlock *block)
01499 {
01500     int winx, winy;
01501     
01502     wm_window_get_size(window, &winx, &winy);
01503     
01504     if (block->minx < MENU_SHADOW_SIDE)
01505         block->minx = MENU_SHADOW_SIDE;
01506     if (block->maxx > winx - MENU_SHADOW_SIDE)
01507         block->maxx = winx - MENU_SHADOW_SIDE;
01508     
01509     if (block->miny < MENU_SHADOW_BOTTOM)
01510         block->miny = MENU_SHADOW_BOTTOM;
01511     if (block->maxy > winy - MENU_TOP)
01512         block->maxy = winy - MENU_TOP;
01513 }
01514 
01515 void ui_popup_block_scrolltest(uiBlock *block)
01516 {
01517     uiBut *bt;
01518     /* Knowing direction is necessary for multi-column menus... */
01519     int is_flip = (block->direction & UI_TOP) && !(block->flag & UI_BLOCK_NO_FLIP);
01520     
01521     block->flag &= ~(UI_BLOCK_CLIPBOTTOM | UI_BLOCK_CLIPTOP);
01522     
01523     for (bt = block->buttons.first; bt; bt = bt->next)
01524         bt->flag &= ~UI_SCROLLED;
01525     
01526     if (block->buttons.first == block->buttons.last)
01527         return;
01528     
01529     /* mark buttons that are outside boundary and the ones next to it for arrow(s) */
01530     for (bt = block->buttons.first; bt; bt = bt->next) {
01531         if (bt->y1 < block->miny) {
01532             bt->flag |= UI_SCROLLED;
01533             block->flag |= UI_BLOCK_CLIPBOTTOM;
01534             /* make space for arrow */
01535             if (bt->y2 < block->miny + 10) {
01536                 if (is_flip && bt->next && bt->next->y1 > bt->y1)
01537                     bt->next->flag |= UI_SCROLLED;
01538                 else if (!is_flip && bt->prev && bt->prev->y1 > bt->y1)
01539                     bt->prev->flag |= UI_SCROLLED;
01540             }
01541         }
01542         if (bt->y2 > block->maxy) {
01543             bt->flag |= UI_SCROLLED;
01544             block->flag |= UI_BLOCK_CLIPTOP;
01545             /* make space for arrow */
01546             if (bt->y1 > block->maxy - 10) {
01547                 if (!is_flip && bt->next && bt->next->y2 < bt->y2)
01548                     bt->next->flag |= UI_SCROLLED;
01549                 else if (is_flip && bt->prev && bt->prev->y2 < bt->y2)
01550                     bt->prev->flag |= UI_SCROLLED;
01551             }
01552         }
01553     }
01554 }
01555 
01556 uiPopupBlockHandle *ui_popup_block_create(bContext *C, ARegion *butregion, uiBut *but, uiBlockCreateFunc create_func, uiBlockHandleCreateFunc handle_create_func, void *arg)
01557 {
01558     wmWindow *window = CTX_wm_window(C);
01559     static ARegionType type;
01560     ARegion *ar;
01561     uiBlock *block;
01562     uiBut *bt;
01563     uiPopupBlockHandle *handle;
01564     uiSafetyRct *saferct;
01565 
01566     /* create handle */
01567     handle = MEM_callocN(sizeof(uiPopupBlockHandle), "uiPopupBlockHandle");
01568 
01569     /* store context for operator */
01570     handle->ctx_area = CTX_wm_area(C);
01571     handle->ctx_region = CTX_wm_region(C);
01572     
01573     /* create area region */
01574     ar = ui_add_temporary_region(CTX_wm_screen(C));
01575     handle->region = ar;
01576 
01577     memset(&type, 0, sizeof(ARegionType));
01578     type.draw = ui_block_region_draw;
01579     ar->type = &type;
01580 
01581     UI_add_region_handlers(&ar->handlers);
01582 
01583     /* create ui block */
01584     if (create_func)
01585         block = create_func(C, handle->region, arg);
01586     else
01587         block = handle_create_func(C, handle, arg);
01588     
01589     if (block->handle) {
01590         memcpy(block->handle, handle, sizeof(uiPopupBlockHandle));
01591         MEM_freeN(handle);
01592         handle = block->handle;
01593     }
01594     else
01595         block->handle = handle;
01596 
01597     ar->regiondata = handle;
01598 
01599     if (!block->endblock)
01600         uiEndBlock(C, block);
01601 
01602     /* if this is being created from a button */
01603     if (but) {
01604         if (ELEM(but->type, BLOCK, PULLDOWN))
01605             block->xofs = -2;   /* for proper alignment */
01606 
01607         block->aspect = but->block->aspect;
01608 
01609         ui_block_position(window, butregion, but, block);
01610     }
01611     else {
01612         /* keep a list of these, needed for pulldown menus */
01613         saferct = MEM_callocN(sizeof(uiSafetyRct), "uiSafetyRct");
01614         saferct->safety = block->safety;
01615         BLI_addhead(&block->saferct, saferct);
01616         block->flag |= UI_BLOCK_POPUP | UI_BLOCK_NUMSELECT;
01617     }
01618 
01619     /* clip block with window boundary */
01620     ui_popup_block_clip(window, block);
01621     
01622     /* the block and buttons were positioned in window space as in 2.4x, now
01623      * these menu blocks are regions so we bring it back to region space.
01624      * additionally we add some padding for the menu shadow or rounded menus */
01625     ar->winrct.xmin = block->minx - MENU_SHADOW_SIDE;
01626     ar->winrct.xmax = block->maxx + MENU_SHADOW_SIDE;
01627     ar->winrct.ymin = block->miny - MENU_SHADOW_BOTTOM;
01628     ar->winrct.ymax = block->maxy + MENU_TOP;
01629     
01630     block->minx -= ar->winrct.xmin;
01631     block->maxx -= ar->winrct.xmin;
01632     block->miny -= ar->winrct.ymin;
01633     block->maxy -= ar->winrct.ymin;
01634 
01635     for (bt = block->buttons.first; bt; bt = bt->next) {
01636         bt->x1 -= ar->winrct.xmin;
01637         bt->x2 -= ar->winrct.xmin;
01638         bt->y1 -= ar->winrct.ymin;
01639         bt->y2 -= ar->winrct.ymin;
01640     }
01641     
01642     block->flag |= UI_BLOCK_LOOP;
01643 
01644     /* adds subwindow */
01645     ED_region_init(C, ar);
01646 
01647     /* checks which buttons are visible, sets flags to prevent draw (do after region init) */
01648     ui_popup_block_scrolltest(block);
01649     
01650     /* get winmat now that we actually have the subwindow */
01651     wmSubWindowSet(window, ar->swinid);
01652     
01653     wm_subwindow_getmatrix(window, ar->swinid, block->winmat);
01654     
01655     /* notify change and redraw */
01656     ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
01657 
01658     return handle;
01659 }
01660 
01661 void ui_popup_block_free(bContext *C, uiPopupBlockHandle *handle)
01662 {
01663     ui_remove_temporary_region(C, CTX_wm_screen(C), handle->region);
01664     
01665     if (handle->scrolltimer)
01666         WM_event_remove_timer(CTX_wm_manager(C), CTX_wm_window(C), handle->scrolltimer);
01667     
01668     MEM_freeN(handle);
01669 }
01670 
01671 /***************************** Menu Button ***************************/
01672 
01673 static void ui_block_func_MENUSTR(bContext *UNUSED(C), uiLayout *layout, void *arg_str)
01674 {
01675     uiBlock *block = uiLayoutGetBlock(layout);
01676     uiPopupBlockHandle *handle = block->handle;
01677     uiLayout *split, *column = NULL;
01678     uiBut *bt;
01679     MenuData *md;
01680     MenuEntry *entry;
01681     const char *instr = arg_str;
01682     int columns, rows, a, b;
01683     int column_start = 0, column_end = 0;
01684 
01685     uiBlockSetFlag(block, UI_BLOCK_MOVEMOUSE_QUIT);
01686     
01687     /* compute menu data */
01688     md = decompose_menu_string(instr);
01689 
01690     /* columns and row estimation */
01691     columns = (md->nitems + 20) / 20;
01692     if (columns < 1)
01693         columns = 1;
01694     if (columns > 8)
01695         columns = (md->nitems + 25) / 25;
01696 
01697     rows = md->nitems / columns;
01698     if (rows < 1)
01699         rows = 1;
01700     while (rows * columns < md->nitems)
01701         rows++;
01702 
01703     /* create title */
01704     if (md->title) {
01705         if (md->titleicon) {
01706             uiItemL(layout, md->title, md->titleicon);
01707         }
01708         else {
01709             uiItemL(layout, md->title, ICON_NONE);
01710             bt = block->buttons.last;
01711             bt->flag = UI_TEXT_LEFT;
01712         }
01713     }
01714 
01715     /* inconsistent, but menus with labels do not look good flipped */
01716     entry = md->items;
01717     for (a = 0; a < md->nitems; a++, entry++) {
01718         if (entry->sepr && entry->str[0]) {
01719             block->flag |= UI_BLOCK_NO_FLIP;
01720             break;
01721         }
01722     }
01723 
01724     /* create items */
01725     split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0, 0);
01726 
01727     for (a = 0; a < md->nitems; a++) {
01728         if (a == column_end) {
01729             /* start new column, and find out where it ends in advance, so we
01730              * can flip the order of items properly per column */
01731             column_start = a;
01732             column_end = md->nitems;
01733 
01734             for (b = a + 1; b < md->nitems; b++) {
01735                 entry = &md->items[b];
01736 
01737                 /* new column on N rows or on separation label */
01738                 if (((b - a) % rows == 0) || (entry->sepr && entry->str[0])) {
01739                     column_end = b;
01740                     break;
01741                 }
01742             }
01743 
01744             column = uiLayoutColumn(split, 0);
01745         }
01746 
01747         if (block->flag & UI_BLOCK_NO_FLIP)
01748             entry = &md->items[a];
01749         else
01750             entry = &md->items[column_start + column_end - 1 - a];
01751 
01752         if (entry->sepr) {
01753             uiItemL(column, entry->str, entry->icon);
01754             bt = block->buttons.last;
01755             bt->flag = UI_TEXT_LEFT;
01756         }
01757         else if (entry->icon) {
01758             uiDefIconTextButF(block, BUTM | FLO, B_NOP, entry->icon, entry->str, 0, 0,
01759                               UI_UNIT_X * 5, UI_UNIT_Y, &handle->retvalue, (float) entry->retval, 0.0, 0, 0, "");
01760         }
01761         else {
01762             uiDefButF(block, BUTM | FLO, B_NOP, entry->str, 0, 0,
01763                       UI_UNIT_X * 5, UI_UNIT_X, &handle->retvalue, (float) entry->retval, 0.0, 0, 0, "");
01764         }
01765     }
01766     
01767     menudata_free(md);
01768 }
01769 
01770 void ui_block_func_ICONROW(bContext *UNUSED(C), uiLayout *layout, void *arg_but)
01771 {
01772     uiBlock *block = uiLayoutGetBlock(layout);
01773     uiPopupBlockHandle *handle = block->handle;
01774     uiBut *but = arg_but;
01775     int a;
01776     
01777     uiBlockSetFlag(block, UI_BLOCK_MOVEMOUSE_QUIT);
01778     
01779     for (a = (int)but->hardmin; a <= (int)but->hardmax; a++)
01780         uiDefIconButF(block, BUTM | FLO, B_NOP, but->icon + (a - but->hardmin), 0, 0, UI_UNIT_X * 5, UI_UNIT_Y,
01781                       &handle->retvalue, (float)a, 0.0, 0, 0, "");
01782 }
01783 
01784 void ui_block_func_ICONTEXTROW(bContext *UNUSED(C), uiLayout *layout, void *arg_but)
01785 {
01786     uiBlock *block = uiLayoutGetBlock(layout);
01787     uiPopupBlockHandle *handle = block->handle;
01788     uiBut *but = arg_but, *bt;
01789     MenuData *md;
01790     MenuEntry *entry;
01791     int a;
01792     
01793     uiBlockSetFlag(block, UI_BLOCK_MOVEMOUSE_QUIT);
01794 
01795     md = decompose_menu_string(but->str);
01796 
01797     /* title */
01798     if (md->title) {
01799         bt = uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 0, md->title, 0, 0, UI_UNIT_X * 5, UI_UNIT_Y, NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, "");
01800         bt->flag = UI_TEXT_LEFT;
01801     }
01802 
01803     /* loop through the menu options and draw them out with icons & text labels */
01804     for (a = 0; a < md->nitems; a++) {
01805         entry = &md->items[md->nitems - a - 1];
01806 
01807         if (entry->sepr)
01808             uiItemS(layout);
01809         else
01810             uiDefIconTextButF(block, BUTM | FLO, B_NOP, (short)((but->icon) + (entry->retval - but->hardmin)), entry->str,
01811                               0, 0, UI_UNIT_X * 5, UI_UNIT_Y, &handle->retvalue, (float) entry->retval, 0.0, 0, 0, "");
01812     }
01813 
01814     menudata_free(md);
01815 }
