01829 /********************* Color Button ****************/
01830 
01831 /* picker sizes S hsize, F full size, D spacer, B button/pallette height  */
01832 #define SPICK   110.0
01833 #define FPICK   180.0
01834 #define DPICK   6.0
01835 #define BPICK   24.0
01836 
01837 /* for picker, while editing hsv */
01838 void ui_set_but_hsv(uiBut *but)
01839 {
01840     float col[3];
01841     float *hsv = ui_block_hsv_get(but->block);
01842     
01843     hsv_to_rgb(hsv[0], hsv[1], hsv[2], col, col + 1, col + 2);
01844     ui_set_but_vectorf(but, col);
01845 }
01846 
01847 /* also used by small picker, be careful with name checks below... */
01848 static void ui_update_block_buts_rgb(uiBlock *block, const float rgb[3])
01849 {
01850     uiBut *bt;
01851     float *hsv = ui_block_hsv_get(block);
01852     
01853     /* this is to keep the H and S value when V is equal to zero
01854      * and we are working in HSV mode, of course!
01855      */
01856     rgb_to_hsv_compat(rgb[0], rgb[1], rgb[2], hsv, hsv + 1, hsv + 2);
01857     
01858     // this updates button strings, is hackish... but button pointers are on stack of caller function
01859     for (bt = block->buttons.first; bt; bt = bt->next) {
01860         if (bt->rnaprop) {
01861             
01862             ui_set_but_vectorf(bt, rgb);
01863             
01864         }
01865         else if (strcmp(bt->str, "Hex: ") == 0) {
01866             float rgb_gamma[3];
01867             double intpart;
01868             char col[16];
01869             
01870             /* Hex code is assumed to be in sRGB space (coming from other applications, web, etc) */
01871             
01872             if (block->color_profile == BLI_PR_NONE) {
01873                 copy_v3_v3(rgb_gamma, rgb);
01874             }
01875             else {
01876                 /* make an sRGB version, for Hex code */
01877                 linearrgb_to_srgb_v3_v3(rgb_gamma, rgb);
01878             }
01879             
01880             if (rgb_gamma[0] > 1.0f) rgb_gamma[0] = modf(rgb_gamma[0], &intpart);
01881             if (rgb_gamma[1] > 1.0f) rgb_gamma[1] = modf(rgb_gamma[1], &intpart);
01882             if (rgb_gamma[2] > 1.0f) rgb_gamma[2] = modf(rgb_gamma[2], &intpart);
01883 
01884             BLI_snprintf(col, sizeof(col), "%02X%02X%02X", FTOCHAR(rgb_gamma[0]), FTOCHAR(rgb_gamma[1]), FTOCHAR(rgb_gamma[2]));
01885             
01886             strcpy(bt->poin, col);
01887         }
01888         else if (bt->str[1] == ' ') {
01889             if (bt->str[0] == 'R') {
01890                 ui_set_but_val(bt, rgb[0]);
01891             }
01892             else if (bt->str[0] == 'G') {
01893                 ui_set_but_val(bt, rgb[1]);
01894             }
01895             else if (bt->str[0] == 'B') {
01896                 ui_set_but_val(bt, rgb[2]);
01897             }
01898             else if (bt->str[0] == 'H') {
01899                 ui_set_but_val(bt, hsv[0]);
01900             }
01901             else if (bt->str[0] == 'S') {
01902                 ui_set_but_val(bt, hsv[1]);
01903             }
01904             else if (bt->str[0] == 'V') {
01905                 ui_set_but_val(bt, hsv[2]);
01906             }
01907         }       
01908 
01909         ui_check_but(bt);
01910     }
01911 }
01912 
01913 static void do_picker_rna_cb(bContext *UNUSED(C), void *bt1, void *UNUSED(arg))
01914 {
01915     uiBut *but = (uiBut *)bt1;
01916     uiPopupBlockHandle *popup = but->block->handle;
01917     PropertyRNA *prop = but->rnaprop;
01918     PointerRNA ptr = but->rnapoin;
01919     float rgb[4];
01920     
01921     if (prop) {
01922         RNA_property_float_get_array(&ptr, prop, rgb);
01923         ui_update_block_buts_rgb(but->block, rgb);
01924     }
01925     
01926     if (popup)
01927         popup->menuretval = UI_RETURN_UPDATE;
01928 }
01929 
01930 static void do_hsv_rna_cb(bContext *UNUSED(C), void *bt1, void *UNUSED(arg))
01931 {
01932     uiBut *but = (uiBut *)bt1;
01933     uiPopupBlockHandle *popup = but->block->handle;
01934     float rgb[3];
01935     float *hsv = ui_block_hsv_get(but->block);
01936     
01937     hsv_to_rgb(hsv[0], hsv[1], hsv[2], rgb, rgb + 1, rgb + 2);
01938     
01939     ui_update_block_buts_rgb(but->block, rgb);
01940     
01941     if (popup)
01942         popup->menuretval = UI_RETURN_UPDATE;
01943 }
01944 
01945 static void do_hex_rna_cb(bContext *UNUSED(C), void *bt1, void *hexcl)
01946 {
01947     uiBut *but = (uiBut *)bt1;
01948     uiPopupBlockHandle *popup = but->block->handle;
01949     char *hexcol = (char *)hexcl;
01950     float rgb[3];
01951     
01952     hex_to_rgb(hexcol, rgb, rgb + 1, rgb + 2);
01953     
01954     /* Hex code is assumed to be in sRGB space (coming from other applications, web, etc) */
01955     if (but->block->color_profile != BLI_PR_NONE) {
01956         /* so we need to linearise it for Blender */
01957         srgb_to_linearrgb_v3_v3(rgb, rgb);
01958     }
01959     
01960     ui_update_block_buts_rgb(but->block, rgb);
01961     
01962     if (popup)
01963         popup->menuretval = UI_RETURN_UPDATE;
01964 }
01965 
01966 static void close_popup_cb(bContext *UNUSED(C), void *bt1, void *UNUSED(arg))
01967 {
01968     uiBut *but = (uiBut *)bt1;
01969     uiPopupBlockHandle *popup = but->block->handle;
01970     
01971     if (popup)
01972         popup->menuretval = UI_RETURN_OK;
01973 }
01974 
01975 static void picker_new_hide_reveal(uiBlock *block, short colormode)
01976 {
01977     uiBut *bt;
01978     
01979     /* tag buttons */
01980     for (bt = block->buttons.first; bt; bt = bt->next) {
01981         
01982         if (bt->type == LABEL) {
01983             if (bt->str[1] == 'G') {
01984                 if (colormode == 2) bt->flag &= ~UI_HIDDEN;
01985                 else bt->flag |= UI_HIDDEN;
01986             }
01987         }
01988         
01989         if (bt->type == NUMSLI || bt->type == TEX) {
01990             if (bt->str[1] == 'e') {
01991                 if (colormode == 2) bt->flag &= ~UI_HIDDEN;
01992                 else bt->flag |= UI_HIDDEN;
01993             }
01994             else if (ELEM3(bt->str[0], 'R', 'G', 'B')) {
01995                 if (colormode == 0) bt->flag &= ~UI_HIDDEN;
01996                 else bt->flag |= UI_HIDDEN;
01997             }
01998             else if (ELEM3(bt->str[0], 'H', 'S', 'V')) {
01999                 if (colormode == 1) bt->flag &= ~UI_HIDDEN;
02000                 else bt->flag |= UI_HIDDEN;
02001             }
02002         }
02003     }
02004 }
02005 
02006 static void do_picker_new_mode_cb(bContext *UNUSED(C), void *bt1, void *UNUSED(arg))
02007 {
02008     uiBut *bt = bt1;
02009     short colormode = ui_get_but_val(bt);
02010     picker_new_hide_reveal(bt->block, colormode);
02011 }
02012 
02013 /* picker sizes S hsize, F full size, D spacer, B button/pallette height  */
02014 #define SPICK1  150.0
02015 #define DPICK1  6.0
02016 
02017 #define PICKER_H    150
02018 #define PICKER_W    150
02019 #define PICKER_SPACE    6
02020 #define PICKER_BAR      14
02021 
02022 #define PICKER_TOTAL_W  (PICKER_W + PICKER_SPACE + PICKER_BAR)
02023 
02024 static void circle_picker(uiBlock *block, PointerRNA *ptr, PropertyRNA *prop)
02025 {
02026     uiBut *bt;
02027     
02028     /* HS circle */
02029     bt = uiDefButR_prop(block, HSVCIRCLE, 0, "", 0, 0, PICKER_H, PICKER_W, ptr, prop, 0, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, "Color");
02030     uiButSetFunc(bt, do_picker_rna_cb, bt, NULL);
02031     
02032     /* value */
02033     bt = uiDefButR_prop(block, HSVCUBE, 0, "", PICKER_W + PICKER_SPACE, 0, PICKER_BAR, PICKER_H, ptr, prop, 0, 0.0, 0.0, UI_GRAD_V_ALT, 0, "Value");
02034     uiButSetFunc(bt, do_picker_rna_cb, bt, NULL);
02035 }
02036 
02037 
02038 static void square_picker(uiBlock *block, PointerRNA *ptr, PropertyRNA *prop, int type)
02039 {
02040     uiBut *bt;
02041     int bartype = type + 3;
02042     
02043     /* HS square */
02044     bt = uiDefButR_prop(block, HSVCUBE, 0, "",   0, PICKER_BAR + PICKER_SPACE, PICKER_TOTAL_W, PICKER_H, ptr, prop, 0, 0.0, 0.0, type, 0, "Color");
02045     uiButSetFunc(bt, do_picker_rna_cb, bt, NULL);
02046     
02047     /* value */
02048     bt = uiDefButR_prop(block, HSVCUBE, 0, "",       0, 0, PICKER_TOTAL_W, PICKER_BAR, ptr, prop, 0, 0.0, 0.0, bartype, 0, "Value");
02049     uiButSetFunc(bt, do_picker_rna_cb, bt, NULL);
02050 }
02051 
02052 
02053 /* a HS circle, V slider, rgb/hsv/hex sliders */
02054 static void uiBlockPicker(uiBlock *block, float rgba[4], PointerRNA *ptr, PropertyRNA *prop)
02055 {
02056     static short colormode = 0;  /* temp? 0=rgb, 1=hsv, 2=hex */
02057     uiBut *bt;
02058     int width, butwidth;
02059     static char tip[50];
02060     static char hexcol[128];
02061     float rgb_gamma[3];
02062     float min, max, step, precision;
02063     float *hsv = ui_block_hsv_get(block);
02064     
02065     ui_block_hsv_get(block);
02066     
02067     width = PICKER_TOTAL_W;
02068     butwidth = width - UI_UNIT_X - 10;
02069     
02070     /* existence of profile means storage is in linear color space, with display correction */
02071     /* XXX That tip message is not use anywhere! */
02072     if (block->color_profile == BLI_PR_NONE) {
02073         BLI_strncpy(tip, N_("Value in Display Color Space"), sizeof(tip));
02074         copy_v3_v3(rgb_gamma, rgba);
02075     }
02076     else {
02077         BLI_strncpy(tip, N_("Value in Linear RGB Color Space"), sizeof(tip));
02078         /* make an sRGB version, for Hex code */
02079         linearrgb_to_srgb_v3_v3(rgb_gamma, rgba);
02080     }
02081     
02082     /* sneaky way to check for alpha */
02083     rgba[3] = FLT_MAX;
02084 
02085     RNA_property_float_ui_range(ptr, prop, &min, &max, &step, &precision);
02086     RNA_property_float_get_array(ptr, prop, rgba);
02087 
02088     switch (U.color_picker_type) {
02089         case USER_CP_CIRCLE:
02090             circle_picker(block, ptr, prop);
02091             break;
02092         case USER_CP_SQUARE_SV:
02093             square_picker(block, ptr, prop, UI_GRAD_SV);
02094             break;
02095         case USER_CP_SQUARE_HS:
02096             square_picker(block, ptr, prop, UI_GRAD_HS);
02097             break;
02098         case USER_CP_SQUARE_HV:
02099             square_picker(block, ptr, prop, UI_GRAD_HV);
02100             break;
02101     }
02102     
02103     /* mode */
02104     uiBlockBeginAlign(block);
02105     bt = uiDefButS(block, ROW, 0, IFACE_("RGB"), 0, -30, width / 3, UI_UNIT_Y, &colormode, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, "");
02106     uiButSetFunc(bt, do_picker_new_mode_cb, bt, NULL);
02107     bt = uiDefButS(block, ROW, 0, IFACE_("HSV"), width / 3, -30, width / 3, UI_UNIT_Y, &colormode, 0.0, 1.0, 0, 0, "");
02108     uiButSetFunc(bt, do_picker_new_mode_cb, bt, NULL);
02109     bt = uiDefButS(block, ROW, 0, IFACE_("Hex"), 2 * width / 3, -30, width / 3, UI_UNIT_Y, &colormode, 0.0, 2.0, 0, 0, "");
02110     uiButSetFunc(bt, do_picker_new_mode_cb, bt, NULL);
02111     uiBlockEndAlign(block);
02112 
02113     bt = uiDefIconButO(block, BUT, "UI_OT_eyedropper", WM_OP_INVOKE_DEFAULT, ICON_EYEDROPPER, butwidth + 10, -60, UI_UNIT_X, UI_UNIT_Y, NULL);
02114     uiButSetFunc(bt, close_popup_cb, bt, NULL);
02115     
02116     /* RGB values */
02117     uiBlockBeginAlign(block);
02118     bt = uiDefButR_prop(block, NUMSLI, 0, IFACE_("R "),  0, -60, butwidth, UI_UNIT_Y, ptr, prop, 0, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 3, TIP_("Red"));
02119     uiButSetFunc(bt, do_picker_rna_cb, bt, NULL);
02120     bt = uiDefButR_prop(block, NUMSLI, 0, IFACE_("G "),  0, -80, butwidth, UI_UNIT_Y, ptr, prop, 1, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 3, TIP_("Green"));
02121     uiButSetFunc(bt, do_picker_rna_cb, bt, NULL);
02122     bt = uiDefButR_prop(block, NUMSLI, 0, IFACE_("B "),  0, -100, butwidth, UI_UNIT_Y, ptr, prop, 2, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 3, TIP_("Blue"));
02123     uiButSetFunc(bt, do_picker_rna_cb, bt, NULL);
02124 
02125     // could use uiItemFullR(col, ptr, prop, -1, 0, UI_ITEM_R_EXPAND|UI_ITEM_R_SLIDER, "", ICON_NONE);
02126     // but need to use uiButSetFunc for updating other fake buttons
02127     
02128     /* HSV values */
02129     uiBlockBeginAlign(block);
02130     bt = uiDefButF(block, NUMSLI, 0, IFACE_("H "),   0, -60, butwidth, UI_UNIT_Y, hsv, 0.0, 1.0, 10, 3, TIP_("Hue"));
02131     uiButSetFunc(bt, do_hsv_rna_cb, bt, hsv);
02132     bt = uiDefButF(block, NUMSLI, 0, IFACE_("S "),   0, -80, butwidth, UI_UNIT_Y, hsv + 1, 0.0, 1.0, 10, 3, TIP_("Saturation"));
02133     uiButSetFunc(bt, do_hsv_rna_cb, bt, hsv);
02134     bt = uiDefButF(block, NUMSLI, 0, IFACE_("V "),   0, -100, butwidth, UI_UNIT_Y, hsv + 2, 0.0, max, 10, 3, TIP_("Value"));
02135     uiButSetFunc(bt, do_hsv_rna_cb, bt, hsv);
02136     uiBlockEndAlign(block);
02137 
02138     if (rgba[3] != FLT_MAX) {
02139         bt = uiDefButR_prop(block, NUMSLI, 0, IFACE_("A "),  0, -120, butwidth, UI_UNIT_Y, ptr, prop, 3, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, TIP_("Alpha"));
02140         uiButSetFunc(bt, do_picker_rna_cb, bt, NULL);
02141     }
02142     else {
02143         rgba[3] = 1.0f;
02144     }
02145 
02146     BLI_snprintf(hexcol, sizeof(hexcol), "%02X%02X%02X", FTOCHAR(rgb_gamma[0]), FTOCHAR(rgb_gamma[1]), FTOCHAR(rgb_gamma[2]));
02147 
02148     bt = uiDefBut(block, TEX, 0, IFACE_("Hex: "), 0, -60, butwidth, UI_UNIT_Y, hexcol, 0, 8, 0, 0, TIP_("Hex triplet for color (#RRGGBB)"));
02149     uiButSetFunc(bt, do_hex_rna_cb, bt, hexcol);
02150     uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 0, IFACE_("(Gamma Corrected)"), 0, -80, butwidth, UI_UNIT_Y, NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, "");
02151 
02152     rgb_to_hsv(rgba[0], rgba[1], rgba[2], hsv, hsv + 1, hsv + 2);
02153 
02154     picker_new_hide_reveal(block, colormode);
02155 }
02156 
02157 
02158 static int ui_picker_small_wheel_cb(const bContext *UNUSED(C), uiBlock *block, wmEvent *event)
02159 {
02160     float add = 0.0f;
02161     
02162     if (event->type == WHEELUPMOUSE)
02163         add = 0.05f;
02164     else if (event->type == WHEELDOWNMOUSE)
02165         add = -0.05f;
02166     
02167     if (add != 0.0f) {
02168         uiBut *but;
02169         
02170         for (but = block->buttons.first; but; but = but->next) {
02171             if (but->type == HSVCUBE && but->active == NULL) {
02172                 uiPopupBlockHandle *popup = block->handle;
02173                 float col[3];
02174                 float *hsv = ui_block_hsv_get(block);
02175                 
02176                 ui_get_but_vectorf(but, col);
02177                 
02178                 rgb_to_hsv_compat(col[0], col[1], col[2], hsv, hsv + 1, hsv + 2);
02179                 hsv[2] = CLAMPIS(hsv[2] + add, 0.0f, 1.0f);
02180                 hsv_to_rgb(hsv[0], hsv[1], hsv[2], col, col + 1, col + 2);
02181 
02182                 ui_set_but_vectorf(but, col);
02183                 
02184                 ui_update_block_buts_rgb(block, col);
02185                 if (popup)
02186                     popup->menuretval = UI_RETURN_UPDATE;
02187                 
02188                 return 1;
02189             }
02190         }
02191     }
02192     return 0;
02193 }
02194 
02195 uiBlock *ui_block_func_COL(bContext *C, uiPopupBlockHandle *handle, void *arg_but)
02196 {
02197     uiBut *but = arg_but;
02198     uiBlock *block;
02199     
02200     block = uiBeginBlock(C, handle->region, __func__, UI_EMBOSS);
02201     
02202     if (but->rnaprop) {
02203         if (RNA_property_subtype(but->rnaprop) == PROP_COLOR_GAMMA) {
02204             block->color_profile = BLI_PR_NONE;
02205         }
02206     }
02207     
02208     uiBlockSetFlag(block, UI_BLOCK_MOVEMOUSE_QUIT);
02209     
02210     copy_v3_v3(handle->retvec, but->editvec);
02211     
02212     uiBlockPicker(block, handle->retvec, &but->rnapoin, but->rnaprop);
02213     
02214     block->flag = UI_BLOCK_LOOP | UI_BLOCK_REDRAW | UI_BLOCK_KEEP_OPEN | UI_BLOCK_OUT_1;
02215     uiBoundsBlock(block, 10);
02216     
02217     block->block_event_func = ui_picker_small_wheel_cb;
02218     
02219     /* and lets go */
02220     block->direction = UI_TOP;
02221     
02222     return block;
02223 }
02224 
02225 /************************ Popup Menu Memory ****************************/
02226 
02227 static int ui_popup_string_hash(char *str)
02228 {
02229     /* sometimes button contains hotkey, sometimes not, strip for proper compare */
02230     int hash;
02231     char *delimit = strchr(str, '|');
02232 
02233     if (delimit) *delimit = 0;
02234     hash = BLI_ghashutil_strhash(str);
02235     if (delimit) *delimit = '|';
02236 
02237     return hash;
02238 }
02239 
02240 static int ui_popup_menu_hash(const char *str)
02241 {
02242     return BLI_ghashutil_strhash(str);
02243 }
02244 
02245 /* but == NULL read, otherwise set */
02246 uiBut *ui_popup_menu_memory(uiBlock *block, uiBut *but)
02247 {
02248     static int mem[256], first = 1;
02249     int hash = block->puphash;
02250     
02251     if (first) {
02252         /* init */
02253         memset(mem, -1, sizeof(mem));
02254         first = 0;
02255     }
02256 
02257     if (but) {
02258         /* set */
02259         mem[hash & 255] = ui_popup_string_hash(but->str);
02260         return NULL;
02261     }
02262     else {
02263         /* get */
02264         for (but = block->buttons.first; but; but = but->next)
02265             if (ui_popup_string_hash(but->str) == mem[hash & 255])
02266                 return but;
02267 
02268         return NULL;
02269     }
02270 }
02271 
02272 /******************** Popup Menu with callback or string **********************/
02273 
02274 struct uiPopupMenu {
02275     uiBlock *block;
02276     uiLayout *layout;
02277     uiBut *but;
02278 
02279     int mx, my, popup, slideout;
02280     int startx, starty, maxrow;
02281 
02282     uiMenuCreateFunc menu_func;
02283     void *menu_arg;
02284 };
02285 
02286 static uiBlock *ui_block_func_POPUP(bContext *C, uiPopupBlockHandle *handle, void *arg_pup)
02287 {
02288     uiBlock *block;
02289     uiBut *bt;
02290     uiPopupMenu *pup = arg_pup;
02291     int offset[2], direction, minwidth, width, height, flip;
02292 
02293     if (pup->menu_func) {
02294         pup->block->handle = handle;
02295         pup->menu_func(C, pup->layout, pup->menu_arg);
02296         pup->block->handle = NULL;
02297     }
02298 
02299     if (pup->but) {
02300         /* minimum width to enforece */
02301         minwidth = pup->but->x2 - pup->but->x1;
02302 
02303         if (pup->but->type == PULLDOWN || pup->but->menu_create_func) {
02304             direction = UI_DOWN;
02305             flip = 1;
02306         }
02307         else {
02308             direction = UI_TOP;
02309             flip = 0;
02310         }
02311     }
02312     else {
02313         minwidth = 50;
02314         direction = UI_DOWN;
02315         flip = 1;
02316     }
02317 
02318     block = pup->block;
02319     
02320     /* in some cases we create the block before the region,
02321      * so we set it delayed here if necessary */
02322     if (BLI_findindex(&handle->region->uiblocks, block) == -1)
02323         uiBlockSetRegion(block, handle->region);
02324 
02325     block->direction = direction;
02326 
02327     uiBlockLayoutResolve(block, &width, &height);
02328 
02329     uiBlockSetFlag(block, UI_BLOCK_MOVEMOUSE_QUIT);
02330     
02331     if (pup->popup) {
02332         uiBlockSetFlag(block, UI_BLOCK_LOOP | UI_BLOCK_REDRAW | UI_BLOCK_NUMSELECT | UI_BLOCK_RET_1);
02333         uiBlockSetDirection(block, direction);
02334 
02335         /* offset the mouse position, possibly based on earlier selection */
02336         if ((block->flag & UI_BLOCK_POPUP_MEMORY) &&
02337             (bt = ui_popup_menu_memory(block, NULL)))
02338         {
02339             /* position mouse on last clicked item, at 0.8*width of the
02340              * button, so it doesn't overlap the text too much, also note
02341              * the offset is negative because we are inverse moving the
02342              * block to be under the mouse */
02343             offset[0] = -(bt->x1 + 0.8f * (bt->x2 - bt->x1));
02344             offset[1] = -(bt->y1 + 0.5f * UI_UNIT_Y);
02345         }
02346         else {
02347             /* position mouse at 0.8*width of the button and below the tile
02348              * on the first item */
02349             offset[0] = 0;
02350             for (bt = block->buttons.first; bt; bt = bt->next)
02351                 offset[0] = MIN2(offset[0], -(bt->x1 + 0.8f * (bt->x2 - bt->x1)));
02352 
02353             offset[1] = 1.5 * UI_UNIT_Y;
02354         }
02355 
02356         block->minbounds = minwidth;
02357         uiMenuPopupBoundsBlock(block, 1, offset[0], offset[1]);
02358     }
02359     else {
02360         /* for a header menu we set the direction automatic */
02361         if (!pup->slideout && flip) {
02362             ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
02363             if (sa && sa->headertype == HEADERDOWN) {
02364                 ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
02365                 if (ar && ar->regiontype == RGN_TYPE_HEADER) {
02366                     uiBlockSetDirection(block, UI_TOP);
02367                     uiBlockFlipOrder(block);
02368                 }
02369             }
02370         }
02371 
02372         block->minbounds = minwidth;
02373         uiTextBoundsBlock(block, 50);
02374     }
02375 
02376     /* if menu slides out of other menu, override direction */
02377     if (pup->slideout)
02378         uiBlockSetDirection(block, UI_RIGHT);
02379 
02380     uiEndBlock(C, block);
02381 
02382     return pup->block;
02383 }
02384 
02385 uiPopupBlockHandle *ui_popup_menu_create(bContext *C, ARegion *butregion, uiBut *but, uiMenuCreateFunc menu_func, void *arg, char *str)
02386 {
02387     wmWindow *window = CTX_wm_window(C);
02388     uiStyle *style = UI_GetStyle();
02389     uiPopupBlockHandle *handle;
02390     uiPopupMenu *pup;
02391     pup = MEM_callocN(sizeof(uiPopupMenu), __func__);
02392     pup->block = uiBeginBlock(C, NULL, __func__, UI_EMBOSSP);
02393     pup->layout = uiBlockLayout(pup->block, UI_LAYOUT_VERTICAL, UI_LAYOUT_MENU, 0, 0, 200, 0, style);
02394     pup->slideout = (but && (but->block->flag & UI_BLOCK_LOOP));
02395     pup->but = but;
02396     uiLayoutSetOperatorContext(pup->layout, WM_OP_INVOKE_REGION_WIN);
02397 
02398     if (!but) {
02399         /* no button to start from, means we are a popup */
02400         pup->mx = window->eventstate->x;
02401         pup->my = window->eventstate->y;
02402         pup->popup = 1;
02403         pup->block->flag |= UI_BLOCK_NO_FLIP;
02404     }
02405     /* some enums reversing is strange, currently we have no good way to
02406      * reverse some enum's but not others, so reverse all so the first menu
02407      * items are always close to the mouse cursor */
02408     else {
02409 #if 0
02410         /* if this is an rna button then we can assume its an enum
02411          * flipping enums is generally not good since the order can be
02412          * important [#28786] */
02413         if (but->rnaprop && RNA_property_type(but->rnaprop) == PROP_ENUM) {
02414             pup->block->flag |= UI_BLOCK_NO_FLIP;
02415         }
02416 #endif
02417         if (but->context)
02418             uiLayoutContextCopy(pup->layout, but->context);
02419     }
02420 
02421     if (str) {
02422         /* menu is created from a string */
02423         pup->menu_func = ui_block_func_MENUSTR;
02424         pup->menu_arg = str;
02425     }
02426     else {
02427         /* menu is created from a callback */
02428         pup->menu_func = menu_func;
02429         pup->menu_arg = arg;
02430     }
02431     
02432     handle = ui_popup_block_create(C, butregion, but, NULL, ui_block_func_POPUP, pup);
02433 
02434     if (!but) {
02435         handle->popup = 1;
02436 
02437         UI_add_popup_handlers(C, &window->modalhandlers, handle);
02438         WM_event_add_mousemove(C);
02439     }
02440     
02441     MEM_freeN(pup);
02442 
02443     return handle;
02444 }
02445 
02446 /******************** Popup Menu API with begin and end ***********************/
02447 
02448 /* only return handler, and set optional title */
02449 uiPopupMenu *uiPupMenuBegin(bContext *C, const char *title, int icon)
02450 {
02451     uiStyle *style = UI_GetStyle();
02452     uiPopupMenu *pup = MEM_callocN(sizeof(uiPopupMenu), "popup menu");
02453     uiBut *but;
02454     
02455     pup->block = uiBeginBlock(C, NULL, __func__, UI_EMBOSSP);
02456     pup->block->flag |= UI_BLOCK_POPUP_MEMORY;
02457     pup->block->puphash = ui_popup_menu_hash(title);
02458     pup->layout = uiBlockLayout(pup->block, UI_LAYOUT_VERTICAL, UI_LAYOUT_MENU, 0, 0, 200, 0, style);
02459     uiLayoutSetOperatorContext(pup->layout, WM_OP_EXEC_REGION_WIN);
02460 
02461     /* create in advance so we can let buttons point to retval already */
02462     pup->block->handle = MEM_callocN(sizeof(uiPopupBlockHandle), "uiPopupBlockHandle");
02463     
02464     /* create title button */
02465     if (title && title[0]) {
02466         char titlestr[256];
02467         
02468         if (icon) {
02469             BLI_snprintf(titlestr, sizeof(titlestr), " %s", title);
02470             uiDefIconTextBut(pup->block, LABEL, 0, icon, titlestr, 0, 0, 200, UI_UNIT_Y, NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, "");
02471         }
02472         else {
02473             but = uiDefBut(pup->block, LABEL, 0, title, 0, 0, 200, UI_UNIT_Y, NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, "");
02474             but->flag = UI_TEXT_LEFT;
02475         }
02476     }
02477 
02478     return pup;
02479 }
02480 
02481 /* set the whole structure to work */
02482 void uiPupMenuEnd(bContext *C, uiPopupMenu *pup)
02483 {
02484     wmWindow *window = CTX_wm_window(C);
02485     uiPopupBlockHandle *menu;
02486     
02487     pup->popup = 1;
02488     pup->mx = window->eventstate->x;
02489     pup->my = window->eventstate->y;
02490     
02491     menu = ui_popup_block_create(C, NULL, NULL, NULL, ui_block_func_POPUP, pup);
02492     menu->popup = 1;
02493     
02494     UI_add_popup_handlers(C, &window->modalhandlers, menu);
02495     WM_event_add_mousemove(C);
02496     
02497     MEM_freeN(pup);
02498 }
02499 
02500 uiLayout *uiPupMenuLayout(uiPopupMenu *pup)
02501 {
02502     return pup->layout;
02503 }

02505 /*************************** Standard Popup Menus ****************************/
02506 
02507 static void operator_name_cb(bContext *C, void *arg, int retval)
02508 {
02509     const char *opname = arg;
02510 
02511     if (opname && retval > 0)
02512         WM_operator_name_call(C, opname, WM_OP_EXEC_DEFAULT, NULL);
02513 }
02514 
02515 static void operator_cb(bContext *C, void *arg, int retval)
02516 {
02517     wmOperator *op = arg;
02518     
02519     if (op && retval > 0)
02520         WM_operator_call(C, op);
02521     else
02522         WM_operator_free(op);
02523 }
02524 
02525 static void confirm_cancel_operator(void *opv)
02526 {
02527     WM_operator_free(opv);
02528 }
02529 
02530 static void vconfirm_opname(bContext *C, const char *opname, const char *title, const char *itemfmt, va_list ap)
02531 {
02532     uiPopupBlockHandle *handle;
02533     char *s, buf[512];
02534 
02535     s = buf;
02536     if (title) s += sprintf(s, "%s%%t|", title);
02537     vsnprintf(s, sizeof(buf) - (s - buf), itemfmt, ap);
02538     buf[sizeof(buf) - 1] = '\0';
02539 
02540     handle = ui_popup_menu_create(C, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, buf);
02541 
02542     handle->popup_func = operator_name_cb;
02543     handle->popup_arg = (void *)opname;
02544 }
02545 
02546 static void confirm_operator(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, const char *title, const char *item)
02547 {
02548     uiPopupBlockHandle *handle;
02549     char *s, buf[512];
02550     
02551     s = buf;
02552     if (title) s += BLI_snprintf(s, sizeof(buf), "%s%%t|%s", title, item);
02553     (void)s;
02554     
02555     handle = ui_popup_menu_create(C, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, buf);
02556 
02557     handle->popup_func = operator_cb;
02558     handle->popup_arg = op;
02559     handle->cancel_func = confirm_cancel_operator;
02560 }
02561 
02562 void uiPupMenuOkee(bContext *C, const char *opname, const char *str, ...)
02563 {
02564     va_list ap;
02565     char titlestr[256];
02566 
02567     BLI_snprintf(titlestr, sizeof(titlestr), "OK? %%i%d", ICON_QUESTION);
02568 
02569     va_start(ap, str);
02570     vconfirm_opname(C, opname, titlestr, str, ap);
02571     va_end(ap);
02572 }
02573 
02574 /* note, only call this is the file exists,
02575  * the case where the file does not exist so can be saved without a
02576  * popup must be checked for already, since saving from here
02577  * will free the operator which will break invoke().
02578  * The operator state for this is implicitly OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL */
02579 void uiPupMenuSaveOver(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, const char *filename)
02580 {
02581     confirm_operator(C, op, "Save Over", filename);
02582 }
02583 
02584 void uiPupMenuNotice(bContext *C, const char *str, ...)
02585 {
02586     va_list ap;
02587 
02588     va_start(ap, str);
02589     vconfirm_opname(C, NULL, NULL, str, ap);
02590     va_end(ap);
02591 }
02592 
02593 void uiPupMenuError(bContext *C, const char *str, ...)
02594 {
02595     va_list ap;
02596     char nfmt[256];
02597     char titlestr[256];
02598 
02599     BLI_snprintf(titlestr, sizeof(titlestr), "Error %%i%d", ICON_ERROR);
02600 
02601     BLI_strncpy(nfmt, str, sizeof(nfmt));
02602 
02603     va_start(ap, str);
02604     vconfirm_opname(C, NULL, titlestr, nfmt, ap);
02605     va_end(ap);
02606 }
02607 
02608 void uiPupMenuReports(bContext *C, ReportList *reports)
02609 {
02610     Report *report;
02611     DynStr *ds;
02612     char *str;
02613 
02614     if (!reports || !reports->list.first)
02615         return;
02616     if (!CTX_wm_window(C))
02617         return;
02618 
02619     ds = BLI_dynstr_new();
02620 
02621     for (report = reports->list.first; report; report = report->next) {
02622         if (report->type < reports->printlevel)
02623             ;  /* pass */
02624         else if (report->type >= RPT_ERROR)
02625             BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "Error %%i%d%%t|%s", ICON_ERROR, report->message);
02626         else if (report->type >= RPT_WARNING)
02627             BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "Warning %%i%d%%t|%s", ICON_ERROR, report->message);
02628         else if (report->type >= RPT_INFO)
02629             BLI_dynstr_appendf(ds, "Info %%i%d%%t|%s", ICON_INFO, report->message);
02630     }
02631 
02632     str = BLI_dynstr_get_cstring(ds);
02633     if (str[0] != '\0')
02634         ui_popup_menu_create(C, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, str);
02635     MEM_freeN(str);
02636 
02637     BLI_dynstr_free(ds);
02638 }
02639 
02640 void uiPupMenuInvoke(bContext *C, const char *idname)
02641 {
02642     uiPopupMenu *pup;
02643     uiLayout *layout;
02644     Menu menu;
02645     MenuType *mt = WM_menutype_find(idname, TRUE);
02646 
02647     if (mt == NULL) {
02648         printf("%s: named menu \"%s\" not found\n", __func__, idname);
02649         return;
02650     }
02651 
02652     if (mt->poll && mt->poll(C, mt) == 0)
02653         return;
02654 
02655     pup = uiPupMenuBegin(C, IFACE_(mt->label), ICON_NONE);
02656     layout = uiPupMenuLayout(pup);
02657 
02658     menu.layout = layout;
02659     menu.type = mt;
02660 
02661     mt->draw(C, &menu);
02662 
02663     uiPupMenuEnd(C, pup);
02664 }

02667 /*************************** Popup Block API **************************/
02668 
02669 void uiPupBlockO(bContext *C, uiBlockCreateFunc func, void *arg, const char *opname, int opcontext)
02670 {
02671     wmWindow *window = CTX_wm_window(C);
02672     uiPopupBlockHandle *handle;
02673     
02674     handle = ui_popup_block_create(C, NULL, NULL, func, NULL, arg);
02675     handle->popup = 1;
02676     handle->optype = (opname) ? WM_operatortype_find(opname, 0) : NULL;
02677     handle->opcontext = opcontext;
02678     
02679     UI_add_popup_handlers(C, &window->modalhandlers, handle);
02680     WM_event_add_mousemove(C);
02681 }
02682 
02683 void uiPupBlock(bContext *C, uiBlockCreateFunc func, void *arg)
02684 {
02685     uiPupBlockO(C, func, arg, NULL, 0);
02686 }
02687 
02688 void uiPupBlockEx(bContext *C, uiBlockCreateFunc func, uiBlockHandleFunc popup_func, uiBlockCancelFunc cancel_func, void *arg)
02689 {
02690     wmWindow *window = CTX_wm_window(C);
02691     uiPopupBlockHandle *handle;
02692     
02693     handle = ui_popup_block_create(C, NULL, NULL, func, NULL, arg);
02694     handle->popup = 1;
02695     handle->retvalue = 1;
02696 
02697     handle->popup_arg = arg;
02698     handle->popup_func = popup_func;
02699     handle->cancel_func = cancel_func;
02700     // handle->opcontext= opcontext;
02701     
02702     UI_add_popup_handlers(C, &window->modalhandlers, handle);
02703     WM_event_add_mousemove(C);
02704 }

02725 
02726 void uiPupBlockClose(bContext *C, uiBlock *block)
02727 {
02728     if (block->handle) {
02729         wmWindow *win = CTX_wm_window(C);
02730 
02731         /* if loading new .blend while popup is open, window will be NULL */
02732         if (win) {
02733             UI_remove_popup_handlers(&win->modalhandlers, block->handle);
02734             ui_popup_block_free(C, block->handle);
02735         }
02736     }
02737 }

02741     return block->_hsv;
02742 }
